description: Preform real-time Data Acquisition and Control with Android Phones and Tablets. AndroiDAQ DEMO (short for: Dream, Engineer, Manufacture, and Operate) is a support application for Controlled Capture Systems' AndroiDAQ data acquisition development system and module. The AndroiDAQ module is very small, fully programmable, and very powerful multi-core single-board micro-controller platform, used for electronics prototyping and data acquisition. More information about this module is available at: http://www.controlcapture.com/androiddaqmod . With this application you can easily read the digital states or measure the input frequencies of the input channels or pins, read the voltage levels from the Analog to Digital Converter, and/or set the output pins to digital high/low states or set the Numerically Controlled Oscillators (NCO) to start outputting your desired output frequencies. The Open Source nature of our AndroiDAQ DEMO allows you to peruse the Android code to help you to quickly understand and learn how to send and receive data to and from the AndroiDAQ module for your own Android application. The AndroiDAQ firmware is also available to allow users to modify its code to control how input and output functions interact within the AndroiDAQ module. This allows you to create innovative data acquisition tools and other circuits without the expense and necessity of having to develop hardware for your measurement instruments or robotic devices.
release_text: Bug fixes. Added ScrollView to ADC Sample Screen. New Oscilloscope and ADC Sample screen where you enter the number of samples desired (1-4096) and the sample rate to acquire the samples: 100uSecs, 500uSecs, 1mSec, 50mSecs, 10mSecs, 100mSecs, 500mSecs, 1-Sec. Samples saved to the AndroiDAQ log file with a timestamp. New is also the ability to read and save to phone's SD card this logged data by long pressing the Log Screen's text. The file is saved to the sdcard root directory under log.txt.

description: Verizon Cloud backs up your contacts, photos, videos, music and documents to secure cloud storage, so you don’t need to lose your important content if you lose your tablet. Use Verizon Cloud to back up content from your tablet to your Verizon Cloud account. Here are some of the things Verizon Cloud can do for you: • Securely back up your tablet’s content (contacts, photos, videos and more) to your own cloud account • Access your content when you need it, even on the go, from any compatible device, such as your tablet, smartphone, or computer • Share select media content using your favorite native apps • Back up content from your PC or Mac’s hard drive to your Verizon Cloud account using the downloadable desktop client. You can then access that content on your mobile devices If you are an existing user of Backup Assistant or Backup Assistant Plus, all your content will automatically transfer to Verizon Cloud. Recommended tip: go to Settings>Backup Assistant Plus and turn off syncing for everything including Contacts. This app can be downloaded and used on any tablet running Android software. However, this app has been tested and certified for most Verizon Wireless tablets. Go to www.vzw.com/cloud for the complete list

description: This application calculate based on put frequency, delay and distance between two subwoofers in "Cardio" and "End Fired" configuration. Another function allows to calculate approximate reverberation time based on Sabine formula. This formula is based on assumption, that waves are reach all points in room with random phases and identical power, sldo directions of waves are evenly distributed in full solid angle.

BCA mobile PT Bank Central Asia Tbk BCA banking application in your hand Description: To serve customer better, BCA launches the BCA mobile application. An application that allows you to do transactions via Mobile Banking BCA (m-BCA) and the smartphone version of KlikBCA. How to use: m-BCA  To use our m-BCA service, you need to register at one of our ATM or the nearest BCA branch for cellular number that you will use.  Download the BCA mobile application.  Select m-BCA on the BCA mobile menu. The application will automatically redirect the customer to re-download and replace the BCA mobile where you will then be able to use all the functions of m-BCA.  Make your own Kode Akses (access code) to gain permission to access m-BCA.  If the activation has yet to be done, the customer will be asked to enter their m-BCA PIN to start the activation process.  After the activation process is successful, you can directly do transactions with m-BCA. KlikBCA  To use our KlikBCA service, you need to register at one of our ATM or the nearest BCA Branch  Download the BCA mobile application.  Select KlikBCA on the BCA mobile menu as a launcher, the application will automatically redirect to our smartphone version of KlikBCA’s website ( https://m.klikbca.com ) For further assistant, call halo bca at (021) 500888 via cellular phone Enjoy using the BCA mobile.

The Best Horror Movies Database App features over 700+ ( and growing ) "top rated" horror movies, cult horror movies, and classic horror movies featuring great directors such as George Romero, Francis Ford Coppola, Alfred Hitchcock, Roman Polanski, Takashi Miike, Sam Raimi, Dario Argento, John Carpenter and others! But that's not all! With The Best Horror Movies Database app, you also get the largest library of "top-rated" horror movie classics featuring the greatest horror actors of all time such as Vincent Price, Bela Lugosi, Boris Karloff, Lon Chaney Jr. and Peter Cushing. These films you can watch right on your device at no extra fee to you! APP FEATURES * Browse the ever growing horror movie library * Beautiful and simple to use interface with custom spooky designs * Movie ratings right on the horror library for easy selection * Automatic updates of your horror library without an app upgrade * Search for horror movies by: Film Title Director Actor Year Writer Decade Keyword Once you tap on a film that interests you can: * Watch its full trailer or clip * See movie description, year, directors, actors, ratings and more! * Share movie titles with your friends on Twitter or Facebook * Stream the top rated and *LEGAL* classic movies on your on your device's built-in YouTube video player with nothing else to buy! * Download top rated and *LEGAL* horror movie classics to your device for later viewing * Ever loved a film and wonder how you can find similar movies? See similar movie suggestions for each horror film. * View movie scene photos * View DVD cover details * Watch top rated feature films right on your Netflix, Amazon, or Vudu accounts online. OTHER USES: Have you been working long hours lately or are just out of the loop? With The Best Horror Movies Database app you will find the top rated horror movie releases you've missed by searching by the current year. Lost electricity or going camping? With The Best Horror Movies Database app you can download movies for later viewing and you will have the largest library of spooky horror classics you can watch right on your device for hours of entertainment! With The Best Horror Movies Database App you can find the horror movie you are in the mood for with a quick search. Detail search instructions and popular keywords used on the app can be found on the Help Page of the app. With The Best Horror Movies Database app, you will never run out of the top rated horror movie suggestions or top rated horror classics to watch right on your device! Enjoy! If you enjoyed the app, please leave a review. Otherwise, please contact us with any issues about the app at: info@charmedapps.com . Thank you and Enjoy!! *NOT YET AVAILABLE FOR 13 INCH TABLETS*

description: Enjoy classic game of Checkers (draughts, damas, dama, dame or damka) for Android. Checkers is 8x8 board game and enables features: * checkers game enables tracing game duration (time starts running immediately), * checkers game has moves counter (double jump means double move), * checkers game follows game statistics or game log, where you can see last 5 checker game matches. Checkers are played on an 8 by 8 squared board with 12 checkers on each side. The checkers moves and capture diagonally. Checkers may only move forward until they reach the opposite end of the board when checkers become king-checkers or crowned-checkers. King checker may henceforth move and capture other checkers both backward and forward. One player has dark and another red checkers. They take turns moving their checkers. Players move their checkers diagonally from one square to another square. When a player jumps over their opponent's checker (the other player's) checker, the checker is removed from the board. The player's goal is to take all the checkers of its opponent. King checkers - If a player's checker moves into the kings row on the opposing player's side of the board, that checker is said to be crowned (or often kinged), becoming a king checker. Keyword: checkers, checkers game, draughts, draughts game, damas, damas game, dama, dama game, damka, damka game

❖ 미가엘 성경 개역개정 버전 정식판 출시 ❖ 20년 전통의 반주기 기술로 만들어낸 미가엘 성경을 만나보세요! 성경 전권 + 성경읽기표 + 새찬송가 악보 + 부록( 사도신경, 주기도문, 교독문등) 을 만나보실 수 있습니다. 낭독 오디오 성경의 최고의 편리성과 많은 기능들을 먼저 체험해보세요. ❖ Contents 1. 성경 : 개역개정( 본문 + 장별 및 전체 다운로드 방식의 음성 낭독) 2. 새찬송가 악보 : 새찬송가 645곡 ( 리얼악보 적용) 3. 부록 : 사도신경, 주기도문, 교독문, 십계명, 새사도신경, 새주기도문, 새교독문 ❖ 주요 기능 ▶ 극동방송 공부영 아나운서( 현 극동방송 이사) - 최고의 아나운서, 극동방송 공부영 아나운서 직접 참여 - 온화하며 편안한 공부영 장로님의 육성 ▶ 새찬송가 645곡 리얼악보 추가 - 찬송가 번호로 원하는 찬송가를 빠르게 이동 - 리얼악보를 적용한 확대/축소 기능 - 페이지 넘김 방식 적용하여 자연스러운 장 이동 ▶ 정독, 속독 기능 - 정독, 속독 기능으로 통독 및 빠른 음성 재생 지원 - 음 높낮이가 변하지 않는 속독 음성 ▶ 성경 검색 기능 - 정확하고 빠른 성경 검색 - 전체, 신/구약, 권 등 여러가지 검색 구역 설정 - 문장, 또는 여러 단어를 한번에 검색 ▶ 성경 읽기표 기능 - 성경 통독을 위한 읽기표 제공 - 읽기표를 통한 빠른 성경 이동 및 읽기 확인 기능 ▶ 형광팬 및 메모 기능 - 원하는 구절에 형광팬 및 메모 추가 기능 - 형광팬 리스트에서 원하는 구절로 이동 및 수정 기능 ▶ 페이지 넘기기 방식 - 스크롤 방식의 번거로움을 완벽히 개선한 페이지 방식 - 전페이지, 다음페이지, 다음장, 전장을 간단한 움직임으로 이동 - 절단위 이동 버튼 추가로 빠른 절 이동 ▶ 정교한 음성 & 본문 싱크 - 정교한 음성 싱크작업으로 읽고있는 본문과 낭독음성이 정확히 일치 - 낭독하는 절 단위로 재생구절을 정확히 표시 가능 - 페이지, 절, 장 이동시에도 정확한 위치에서 음성 낭독 ▶ 여러가지 글씨 크기, 재생구절 표시 방식, 및 배경화면 설정 - 6가지 글씨크기 조정 - 가장 큰 글씨에서 가독성을 높여주는 중앙 정렬 방식 사용 - 재생중인 구절을 다른 색상이나 진한 강조로 표시 - 취향에 따라 선택할 수 있는 20여가지 배경화면 ▶ 전권/권/장 반복, 절반복 기능 - 여러가지 반복기능으로 원하는 권/장만을 청취 가능 - 절반복 기능으로 성경 암송에도 활용 ▶ 빠르고 간편한 성경 선택 및 책갈피 기능 - 성경목록과 장/절 선택을 한 화면에서 간단하게 선택 - 원하는 절을 책갈피에 추가 및 손쉬운 편집기능 ▶ 갤럭시탭 및 7인치 이상의 큰 화면 지원 - 큰 화면에서 더욱 넓고 시원하게 사용 - 화면이 깨지거나 이상하게 보이지 않음 ▶ Dropbox 를 이용한 사용자 정보 백업 및 복원 기능 - 세계적인 클라우드 서비스인 Dropbox 를 통한 백업 - 스마트폰 초기화, 또는 분실로 인한 자료의 복구 - 책갈피, 형광팬, 통독표를 모두 안전하게 백업 ❖ 참고사항 1. 음성 자료는 각 장을 플레이 하실때, 또는 전권 다운로드시에 받게 됩니다. 2. 해당 장의 음성자료가 없을때만 다운로드하며, 한번만 다운받으시면 됩니다. 3. 음성 다운로드가 잘 안되는경우는 대부분 무선인터넷(WIFI) 신호가 약하거나 3G, LTE 속도가 느린 경우입니다. 4. 무제한 요금제 또는 Wi-Fi 를 이용하지 않을경우 음성성경 다운로드시 통화료가 부과될 수 있으니 이용에 참고하시기 바랍니다. 5. 수많은 테스트와 오류 수정으로 판매하는 미가엘 제품입니다. 하지만 스마트폰마다의 특성을 전부 파악하기는 어려운 관계로 사용에 불편이 있으실땐 언제라도 연락 주시기 바랍니다. ❖ 저작권 내용 1. 성경전서 개역개정판의 저작권은 대한성서공회에 있음 2. 음성자료에 대한 저작권은 (주)이엠미디어에 있음 ---- 개발자 연락처 : 주 소 : 서울시 은평구 역촌2동 71-15 전화번호 : 02-352-2530

description: Food Builder is the easiest way to store, manage, and share the nutrition data of your own recipes. No matter if you are a student, a restaurant owner, or a nutrition enthusiast, Food Builder is the way to do it. Features: Besides a Clean User Interface, and its independence of an internet connection to look for products, Food Builder has the following features: 1) Create recipes using a database with more than 1000 products 2) Customize recipes with images (Internet connection needed to look images on the web, if that's the case) 3) Share recipes, and nutrition information 4) Add more products to the database 5) Each product has 28 columns of important information, such as minerals and vitamins that may be checked at any time. Note: Food Builder is not a Calorie Counter, nor a Diet App. Food Builder only works with grams (SI) The provided nutrition data is presented per 100 grams of edible portions or net grams, including those products used or served with the disposable portion as part of the food (eg.) chicken. In the case of liquids, the composition also corresponds to 100 grams. In some cases, the density of some liquids is very close to 1, which may be assumed equal to 100 cc. PLEASE! Before giving a negative review: 1) Read the entire description to understand the app completely. 2) Try using the feedback option within the app. If you let me know any of your concerns, I will try my best to solve them. 3) if you don't have any more options, please, be specific in your "negative" review :( 4) if the app crashes, report immediately. That is the only way to attack these problems. Thanks!!!!

description: The Football Play Card app gives football coaches the ability to create and draw football plays, play cards, play scripts, and playbooks in a speedy, simple and sophisticated manner. Get the free app as a part of your FootballPlayCard.com membership and you can instantly create and view play cards on your Android tablet. If you are not currently a Football Play Card member, sign up for free for 7 days and start creating play cards, play scripts and playbooks immediately. Football Play Card has been designed by former collegiate football players with input from professional and collegiate coaches to include the necessary features to take creating and drawing football plays, play cards, play scripts, and playbooks to the championship level. Coaches at the youth, high school, college and professional levels will no longer have to waste time drawing football play cards by hand and can spend more time focusing on winning. With the tap of a few buttons, not only can you modify the preset formations and play cards, you can also create custom reusable offensive formations, defensive fronts, and defensive coverages. Take your play cards to the field on an Android tablet or by printing them out from the web. This is a must-have tool for football coaches at every level. Available Features - Create and draw play cards for offense, defense, and special teams - Use preset offensive formations, defensive fronts, and defensive coverages to create play card -- 10 Offensive Personnels -- 36 Offensive Formations -- 8 Defensive Personnels -- 26 Defensive Fronts -- 12 Defensive Coverages - Over 1000 unique preset play cards available (includes Offense, Defense, Kickoff, Punt, and Field Goal) - Defensive front alignments are unique for each offensive formation - Defensive coverage alignments are based on the offensive formation and defensive front that are selected - Update the terminology of personnels, formations, fronts, and coverages to match your team - Drag and move players and defensive actions on the screen to customize the play card for the alignment you need - Select routes, blocks, coverage zones for each player - Draw your own routes, blocks, coverages, blitzes, and stunts on play cards - Create play scripts based on your play cards - Add shading to offensive players - Change the letter, number, and color of a player (Player Options) - Change the letter, number, and color of a player (Player Options) - Create reusable formations, fronts and coverages by saving your changes to preset formations, fronts and coverages - Flip the play card or the formation, front, and coverage to get the look you need - Player-snap-to-grid to get perfect alignments - Use Field Options to change settings for the Hash Marks, Yard Lines, Yard Line Numbers and Play Card Info. - Display all of your selected cards in a play script on your Android tablet during practice so you do not have to draw them by hand. - Edit and save changes to play cards - Sync play card data to the Football Play Card cloud - Access your play card data on other devices and computers - Print your play cards on the web at FootballPlayCard.com - Ability to share play card binders with multiple accounts (Contact Support@FootballPlayCard.com for setup information)
release_text: Ability to add a fill color to a player's circle. Additional general enhancements and fixes.

description: The official Android version of the board game designed by Néstor Romeral Andrés. Play with friends or against the AI... or challenge yourself with 250 Heptalion puzzles! The game: Heptalion is a special dominoes game played on a diamond-shaped board of 56 squares depicting 7 different symbols on them. The players struggle to place their domino tiles on the board. The last player placing a tile wins. The puzzles: Each puzzle challenges you to place all the pieces on the board. This app includes: - 4 different boards to play the classic game - Play the classic game on a random board - 250 puzzles -------------------------------------------------- Keywords: board game, abstract game, artificial intelligence, AI, puzzle.

app_name: マギの穴埋めクイズ～魔導士漫画に関する穴埋め問題～

Given the daily concerns, even your best friends might be out of sight sometimes, so never miss any chance to meet up ! MapContact is a location-based social application that allows you to keep an eye on your friends and family. It shows you, in real time, where they are on a map, and notify you when a friend is close ! It's also useful when you travel with friends, organize any kind of event, get lost with your friends while going out, or if you want to assure your family safety, you can also find your lost phone etc MapContact shows the nearest places that may be useful for you (Restaurant, hotel, coffee, subway station, bus, train, hospital etc), and allow you to save in your map any other interesting place. Unlike the other applications, MapContact is very light, simple and efficient, no hard configuration or confusing options, no long sign up, no required Facebook or Foursquare account, no long time loading maps.. Check out yourself ! The application is optimized to save your battery life : No GPS access, no long background tasks, no updates if the user is not moving etc. Since the privacy is the most concerning issue, your location can be only shared with those friends who invited you through your acceptance. Once you decide to stop sharing your location, just go to "Settings" then "Application Settings" and activate the "Invisible mode" ! How does it work ? Start with inviting at least one friend to install the application. When it's done, you can see him in "Contacts" Menu. Press and choose "Add to my friends list" in the contextual menu. Your friend can find your request in the "Notifications" menu, press to accept. And now it's fun ! You can see him on a map after going to "Friends Network" menu and refreshing. When you are within a certain distance from a friend (default distance is 2km), the application sends a notification to both of you. You can change this distance in "Settings", then "Application settings". In "Settings" => "Application settings" you can also activate the "Invisible mode", deactivate notifications or vibration etc. If you're looking for the nearest restaurant or subway station, just go to "Search". MapContact can run in background, but if you force stop it, your location can't be updated. Have fun ! We’re excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at : mapcontact.android@gmail.com * * More than 15.000 downloads, thank you all for your support * *
release_text: Design optimization 3D Map view New notification parameters Minor bugs fixed

Users college level math with some knowledge in multivariable analysis will appreciate in depth all the features of this app. 3D-Functions Plotter is free a multivariable analysis tool designed to graph two variabled f(x,y) functions and surfaces parametrizations in R3-Space. Application makes dynamic calculations for user-input equations, such us double integral and partial derivates, differentiable operators ... These all calculations requires internet connection. 3DFunctions Plotter Covers the following features: - 3D GRAPHING: Graph two variabled f(x,y) functions. - GEOMETRY: Graph parametrized Surfaces and Manifolds. - INTEGRATION: calculates analytic double integral, also Numeric integral is supported. - DIFFERENTIATION: calculate partial derivates Laplacian and Gradient operators. - HELP SECTION: functions writting, examples, graphics explanation ... - CONTACT FORM: with it you can obtain support directly on this app.
release_text: - Various surfaces in the same graph - Calculates Analytic indefinite double integral. - Calulates Analytical Gradient and Laplacian in the Differentiation. - Improving graphic performance.

description: Now you and your friends can see who is the quickest with I Buzzed First! Have you ever wanted to host your own quiz, but needed an easy way to know who is the first to answer? I Buzzed First! is the app you need. One phone acts as the 'Quiz Master', and any number of Contestants (on separate phones) connect to the quiz. When you're ready to start, the Quiz Master starts the first round, and the buzzer buttons on all the Contenstant's phones light up. The first Contestant to press their buzzer is rewarded with a satisfying sound, and locks all the other Contestants out. Then the Quiz Master starts the next round, and off you go again! Great for setting up quiz bowl / game show buzzer / trivia party / Jeopardy gameshow type events when you need to buzz in. I Buzzed First! even tells everyone in the quiz the name of the person who buzzed first. Any number of Contestants can connect to the same quiz. NOTE: The app will need to be installed on at least THREE phones to be useful. One phone acts as the 'Quiz Master', and two (or many more) other phones join the quiz to see who buzzes first. All the phones MUST be connected to the same WiFi network. (Will not work on 2/3G only) * Fully Compatible with the iPhone version of I Buzzed First! * You can form a quiz with any combination of Android Phones and iPhones running I Buzzed First! Please send any support questions to support@ibuzzedfirst.com for a speedy response
release_text: V1.03 ----- Removed the unnecessary permission WriteExternalStorage V1.02 ----- Fixed a bug which can stop app unloading when quiz finished V1.01 ----- Fixed a bug which can stop the app starting properly when run a second time V1 -- Initial release

description: Quizomania is a ultimate knowledge challenge. This quiz game contains many game modes that will satisfy almost every quiz lover. It has been spiced up with smooth animations and impressive graphics that will surely impress you. Also this game doesn't require a internet connection, so you can enjoy it anywhere completely free! FEATURES ----------------- - 3 types of game modes (normal quiz, stages mode, survival mode) - 8 innovative jokers (Immunity, Skipper, 50:50, Buy time, Pause time, Eliminate one or two wrong answers. Change question) - More then 3 thousands of questions - 11 categories (Science, History, Biology, General knowledge, Culture, Geography, Literature, Movies, Music, Sport) - 13 achievements (bronze, silver and gold medals) - Highscore list for normal quiz and survival game mode - Questions are divided into 3 difficulties - Beautiful High definition graphic Normal quiz Goal is to answer 18 questions before time runs out. Questions are divided in three difficulties. If you need help you can buy jokers with score points and try to finish the game and get a bonus for your highscore. Stages mode Play in 8 different categories and combine score to unlock new more challenging levels. You are allowed to use help of jokers, but use it carefully because every point counts. Survival mode Try to stay in the game as long as you can without help. Wrong answer won't end the game, but will reduce play time. Every correct answer will increase play time, so choose your answers carefully. Jockers explanation: - Immunity Immunity jocker is jocker that will save you from giving a wrong answer. Immunity is an ultimate saver! - Skipper This jocker will allow you to skip given question. Really useful when playing normal quiz mode. - 50:50 This one is a well know but jet really desirable help. It will eliminate 2 wrong answers so you will have at least 50% chance to answer correctly - Buy time A must if you are short on game time, or you wish to think a bit longer! - Pause time Or we call it a freezer. Jocker that will allow you to freeze time on current question and think without stress or find an answer on internet :) - Change question This one will change your current question with another one of the same difficulties. Could be a great help if you feel lucky. Please be careful when buying jockers because you are buying them with the points you earned with correct answers. Also don't forget to try Immunity and Skipper. They are ultimate tool to help you! ----------- If you will have any problems with the game feel free to contact us via our contact form http://lightningstudio.net/index.php/contact and we will gladly help you.
release_text: Version 1.0.3 - new questions - fixed grammar errors - performance optimization

Play this fairytale game featuring Sleeping Beauty. A king and a queen become the proud parents of a beautiful baby daughter, and they organize a huge feast for all their family members and friends and also for the fairies in the country. There are thirteen fairies, but there are only 12 golden plates, that's why the king doesn't invite one of the fairies. This fairy gets very upset. After the feast all the fairies wish the little baby all the best, but after the eleventh fairy the angry, uninvited fairy comes storming into the castle. She predicts that the child will prick herself on the needle of a spinning wheel when she'll be fifteen years old, and that she'll sleep for a hundred years! The king summons to destroy all the spinning wheels in the country, but one's accidentally left in the castle tower. On her fifteenth birthday the princess is wandering through the castle, and she enters into the tower where nobody has been for years anymore. She sees the spinning wheel and wants to touch it, but then she pricks herself! The girl falls on the bed behind her, into a deep, deep sleep. The whole castle falls asleep, too; even the flies on the wall don't manage to stay awake. A thick thorn-hedge grows around the whole castle and nobody remembers anymore that once, there was a castle. One day, a prince passes by the thorn-edge and he hacks his way through it. There, inside the thorn-hedge, he finds the castle, full of sleeping people. He starts walking through the castle, higher and higher, until he reaches the tower and sees the princess asleep. He falls in love with her on the spot and kisses her, which awakes her all of a sudden! The whole castle wakes up and a wedding's organized for the prince and the princess. They lived happily ever after... In this game you can read the entire story. Spot the differences and go for the highest score. To play on your pc or laptop go to: http://www.mary.com/sleeping-beauty-find-the-differences.html

description: Try new original type of the ancient game mahjong that combines several favorite logical games. The kind sorcerer creates the magic in the trunk of a centuries-old oak in the dark forest. To move the magic element click it and choose the direction of its motion. The game has excellent rich colorful graphics and addictive gameplay. You can enjoy the game with no registration. PLEASE RATE IT IF YOU LIKE THE GAME. THANK YOU VERY MUCH.

Lacrosse Dood is a must have application for lacrosse coaches. A great clipboard or playbook application, it allows users to touch and move players around on a lacrosse field and then layer on doodles and text as well as animate players to create plays. Once happy with the image or play, users can then save or share them. Can be used on phone or tablet, buy once! Paid features - no ads - play saving and sharing (images are free) Features: - quick play area transitions or use multitouch to position field - move players, add pylons, refs and a ball - save/share images & animations - add text and move it around - various doodles such as arrow line or dotted line Please email me for support or feature requests: info@sportsdood.com

Gravity Triangle is a mostly green, retro style, flying space ship kinda game, made up of Triangles, Walls and Checkpoints. Fly the retro space ship Triangle thing, dodge the retro green Walls, and pass the totally indie Checkpoints then land, easy right? Well it's easy to start off with, but gets pretty hard, there are nine classic levels and I'm still stuck on level 5. Achieve high scores and cool ranks, while listening to awesome classical music from Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com). This game is free, with no adds or in app purchase, so really free, like totally free, like free like a bird or free beer free. You can donate to the indie cause in the game, so don't worry if you want to pay you can, plus supporting indie devs is just cool in its own right. A call back to some retro games that we used to play until we had blisters. So hold on to your triangles, watch out for those walls and enjoy the retro ride!
release_text: This is Gravity Triangles first release to the Play Store. Everything is new!

description: WellHandbook WellHandbook is a free application offered to the oilfield cementing community. The application has been released to facilitate volume calculations that were perfomed in the past using engineering tables, paper and a calculator while increasing the precisions of the results, The first version of WellHandbook allows you to: Calculate the annular volume between Open Hole or Casing and the inner Casing, Drillpipe or Tubing Calculate the metal displacement volume of Drillpipes and Tubings Calculate the capacity volume of Open Holes, Casings, Drillpipes and Tubings Provides annular, capacity or Metal displacement volume calculation to up to three different sections Add Excess percentage volume for annular and capacity volume Use English (Oilfield) units, Metrics units or Mixed units to cover the particularities of the geographics you operate at The tables and calculations have been verified by third parties againts multiple enginnering tables available in the market to ensure we offer the most reliable tool to the oil and gas community. We hope WellHandbook application increase your productivity and accuracy, OFSApps would keep bringing free applications to the oilfield community to facilitate the calculations and processes while increasing the efficiency in the oil and gas

description: Casino Overnight Parking or RV Park is a good way to save money for RV traveler. Many casinos in the US offer free overnight parking for RVer or Trucker and many others offer low cost RV parks. Some of the casinos offer both. Overnight Parking or Dry Camp are mostly free while Casino RV Park usually offers full-hookup RV Park on site, and many of these RV parks are very nice. This app provide a comprehensive guide for Casino Overnight Parking and Casino RV Parks. We show all of the RV friendly Casino on map. User can easily find out what is available nearby or search by location. We gather as much information as possible for each of the Casino such as Address, Phone, Website, whether free overnight parking allowed and RV Park availability. If you have any question or have a new location in mind that you would like to share, you can simply submit it in app or email us.
release_text: All RV friendly Casino on map

description: ### DOWNLOAD THE APP FOR FREE ### TAKE ADVANTAGE OF THE PROMOTION The Good Stopping app provides a careful review about the stopping stations located along the whole Italian highways network. All reviews are mainly gathered by independent journalists and refer both to PETROL Stations and to RESTAURANT Areas, with detailed description and ranking. It is an app thought for drivers who can plan much more carefully in which stopping area they can have a break, according to services and quality offered by each area. You can find out all stopping areas located on a specific highway or search them by ranking, by distance from your current position, or even by specific services you would like to get at the next stopping area. Hence, if you are looking for an area equipped for camping bus or with a very good review about toilettes or where you can get LPG or an area providing a wifi connection or any other service, then you just need to use this app and find out the stopping area where you plan to stop. If you even wish to be ALERTED when you are getting close to a specific stopping area, a message can alert you how many kilometers are still missing to get there. Moreover, if you want to write a review about a stopping station, then you can do it through the app itself. All data about stopping stations (names, reviews, positions) included in the app are provided by Market Road: a guide for all stopping areas along the Italian highways.
release_text: Minor improvements of the ALERT feature.

Smart phones serial control panel program. USB equipment using Silicon Laboratories CP210X, FTDI FT232 and Prolific PL2303, CDC/ACM UART to USB Bridge chips can be used to connect to your smart phone. Zigbee Chip TI CC2531(USB-Enabled SOC Solution for 2.4-GHz IEEE 802.15.4 and ZigBee App) can be used also. You can add frequently used functions as buttons, and then click the control button to transmit preconfigured data. - Supported chip: Silicon Laboratories(CP210X), FTDI(FT232), Prolific(PL2303) - ARDUINO Support(FTDI, CDC/ACM) - Supported phones: USB host support smart phones (Samsung galaxy2/galaxy 3/galaxy note / galaxy note2/Vega racer R3) - Supported Android version: Android version 3.1 (API Level 12) 0. Quick Start 1) Please use the OTG cable to connect the usb device on your smart phone. 2) Smart phone detect usb device, and then asks whether to run. Click OK to run the App. 3) Click the "Settings" button (wrench icon) of upper right corner in order to set serial communication. 4) Click the "Save" button. 5) Click the "Connect button(phone icon)" of upper right corner in order to connect to the device. 6) Click "add conrol button"(Plus icon) in toolbar, and then input name and content to send 7) Click the Save button 8) Control button will be added in the panel. 9) Click the button on the control panel, app will transfer the data(content) to the device. 10) App will show the response from USB device at the receive text view. 2. Control button content Binary data is entered as shown below, you can enter in hex or binary or decimal - Decimal: @ +숫자 3-digit(0~255) ex) CR: @013 - Hex: # + 2-digit hex, ex) CR: #0D - Binary: & + 8-digit binary, ex) CR: &00001101 ※Escape @, #, &: insert twice in succession in order to send @, #, & Delay between the transmitted data can be entered. - insert delay(ms) in send data between "<%" and "%>" ex) up<% sleep:1000 %>down<% sleep:2000 %>left<% sleep:3000 %>right 1) send "up" 2) sleep 1 second 3) send "down" 4) sleep 2 second 5) send "left" 6) sleep 3 second 7) send "right"

A money management app that creates simple but powerful savings budgets that help you meet future savings goals or pay off upcoming bills or expenses. The #1 Saving Money App on Android! Our free money manager automatically prioritizes your expenses, budgets and goals, suggests routine payments to meet your savings targets, tracks your savings progress and reminds you of upcoming due dates! Best of all, our app requires no connection to a financial institution! There's no easier way to save money on Android. Looking for the Ad-free Donate Version? Click here: http://goo.gl/LPwys NOW THE #1 MONEY SAVING APP ON GOOGLE PLAY! "Love love love this.. I see my goals in real time with how much money I will need to save monthly, weekly, & daily. . It makes me feel my goals are more achievable..." - B. Gajdos "By far, one of the friendliest apps out there. Easy to use and a perfect way to sock some money away for large or small goals without annoying bloat." - A. Griffin MONEY MANAGEMENT FEATURES • Set a PIN and enable the App Lock to secure your financial information! • Quick overview shows exactly how much money to save for all goals! • Create unlimited budgets and savings goals in over 65 different foreign currencies. • Split your goals & bills into daily, weekly, bi-weekly and monthly required amounts. • Highly customizable notifications remind you of your savings goals and progress. • Create repeating payments to automatically track automatic payments from your bank account. • Home screen widgets provide easy tracking and 1-click access to your budgets and goals. • English, Spanish, Italian, French & German supported. PERSONAL FINANCE USES • Track expenses and learn where you spend too much money • Budget money for vacations, track your future property taxes, save for school tuition, etc. • Track your personal finances such as savings, bill payments and other expenses. • Manage your money simply, goals, bills and budgets are split into easy regular payments. • Create budgets to pay off your credit cards, expenses, mortgage or other debts. SAVE MONEY SAFELY Your privacy is safe, Saving Made Simple does not require any personal information whatsoever. Our app requires no bank account information nor any connections to your financial institutions. Rest assured, if your phone is lost or stolen your financial accounts will not be at risk! THE NEW WAY TO SAVE MONEY Saving money doesn't have to be complicated. Personal finance apps like Mint, EasyMoney and Money Lover, are good, but they don't focus solely on helping you save money. Saving Made Simple is unbeatable when it comes to saving money simply and stress-free. Never worry about your personal finances again! Download the #1 personal finance and money saving app on Android now! FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS Q: Where are the widgets? A: Make sure the app is not installed on the SD Card, widgets only work if the app is installed on the internal storage. Q: The app's installed on internal storage, but widgets aren't enabled? A: If you're using the free version, you must Share the app socially (tweet, Facebook like, Google +, etc.) with your friends before widgets are enabled. Once you share, please wait 10 seconds for the app to confirm your kind gesture.

The Bank Republic presents a new version of MobilBank. This version has several advantages, including a simplified method of connection. Now to become a subscriber of MobilBank no need to change Sim-card and to visit bank, it is enough to get the appropriate passwords from ATM and to download the application via internet on mobile phones. Enrollment to the system: Choose “SERVICES” in the main menu of ATM. In “SERVICES” choose “MOBILBANK ENROLLMENT”. It will be printed a list with Serial Number and Activation passwords. You must install the application from App Store and input this Serial Number and Activation passwords. Then enter your Pin-code. The code will be required twice for checking. This code is not the same as the card Pin-code and is needed only for working with MobilBank application. After that is needed to choose the language. Features: -View balance or statement. -To block the card in case of loss or stolen. -Transfer money from card to card within bank issuer or to other banks. -To pay for service of mobile operators, internet providers, electricity etc. If you have any question, you can contact us on (+994125984697 or +99412194) and csupport@azericard.com . Thank for your feedback in advance, it will help us to keep improving our services.

哈單字，一字一句教你最標準的美式發音！ 背單字時，不再擔心無法正確唸出發音了～ 依不同程度或內容，你可以選擇訂閱　大家說英語 / 空中英語教室 / 彭蒙惠英語的單字。等公車、搭捷運或是排隊等位子時，能利用這些零碎時間，輕鬆背幾個單字。 一個月30塊；一次訂閱6個月，居然只要60塊！超划算！ 每月下載一次訂閱的單字，接下來就可以離線使用～ * 邀請你的好朋友，加入哈單字和你PK單字力！ * 每個單字都會有中文翻譯、例句和發音！ 超有效！ * 背單字，或是隨處發現的新單字，統統可以加入”我的最愛”裡，隨時回頭看～ 超實用！ * 想知道自己的單字實力如何嗎？那就參加哈單字的大會考吧！每週都有全新的單字力排行榜，歡迎刷榜，一起線上搶排名～ 如果您需要協助，歡迎與我們客服代表聯絡，我們很樂意協助您解決問題。 客服信箱： service@studioclassroom.com 客服電話：02-2533-9123

Uniden Guardian 2 Remote app allows you to view live video from your Uniden Guardian Surveillance system. From anywhere in the world you have 3G or higher phone access or WiFi access, you can view your cameras live. This version of the app is required for Guardian firmware version A0.3.5 or higher. If you have Guardian firmware version V 1.5.5, you can upgrade to the latest firmware and use this app. Upgrade your firmware at http://www.unidenvideo.com You can choose any of the 4 supported system cameras. The snapshot feature also allows you to record a still image of your video to your Android device. If you have more than one Uniden Guardian Surveillance system, you can just add it to the app to view. The Uniden Guardian Surveillance system also allows 2 remote viewers simultaneously, each viewing which ever camera they choose. Features: •View live video from your Android device •Choose any camera to view •Supports WiFi networks •Record snapshots to your Android device •System supports 2 remote viewers simultaneously (require 768kbps effective upload bandwidth in any given time)

ICD 10 Pro gives you the mobile power to quickly search by code or diagnosis of the World Health Organization’s (WHO) International Statistical Classification of Diseases and Related Health Problems (ICD-10). Browse by categories and subcategories to clearly drill down to a specific condition. Easily add favorites for later reference. ICD-10 Pro’s small-sized database is stored locally to your device, so there’s NO NEED FOR PHONE SERVICE OR INTERNET CONNECTION. ICD-10 Pro runs ANYWHERE, regardless of wifi or internet connection. Simple, fast, and accurate.

description: Take care of your Dragoni! Dress it, train it and compete against your friends! But what exactly are Dragonis? There are many stories and fables about dragons. There are tales that say dragons are gigantic creatures that breath fire from their mouths. There are even stories that say dragons can speak, and some tell us that dragons bring good luck. The truth is that dragons are rather magical. But what's so special about Dragonis? Well, they live for one simple reason; to have as much fun as possible! Who doesn't like to have fun? Not even a Dragoni wants to be bored. Discover the world of MY DRAGONI with this fantastic app by Panini! - Care for your pet dragon by petting and playing with it. - Train your dragon and prepare it for battle! - Feed it and strengthen its powers. - Dress your dragon in Dragoni fashion accessories and take some amusing photos. - Decorate your Dragoni's home. - Find friends and challenge them with your dragon. - Share your pet's progress on Facebook. - Explore the magical Dragoni Forest and discover new challenges and compete against powerful enemies. - Release magical objects to personalise your mini-dragon. The most awesome dragon, the perfectly trained pet and the funniest opponents... You'll only find them with MY DRAGONI by Panini! New Levels in the Adventure Mode, now many new levels available. New Multiplayer Mode, now you can compete against other players in the League and the Tournaments New equipment for your virtual pet that will you extra power.

Easy SMS Emoji plugin, enable you to send many lovely/cool/funny emoji icons to iPhone or Android phones with Pansi SMS and its Emoji plugin. All the emoji are sent by SMS, needn't MMS. 1. Please make sure you've installed the Easy SMS 1.6 (or above) while you install this plugin. You can search "Pansi" on Android market to get the Easy SMS. 2. How to use the Emoji? When you edit a SMS, Press the attach button,then press the "Emoji" beside the edit box and you can see the cool/lovely/funny emoji. 3.IF you send emoji to Android phone, please make sure that the recipients also have had Pansi SMS and Pansi SMS Emoji plugin installed, so that emoji can be displayed correctly in their phones. 4.IF you send emoji to iPhone, the recipient need not install any plugin.
release_text: Fixed the compatibility issue with newly released iOS5, now you can view the emoji correctly from iPhone 4S

description: 3.5.10 - Lollipop ready! - New SkyController buttons re-configuration settings - New SkyController Bebop radar and co-piloting mode - Anti flickering feature - You can configure the maximum distance pilot/drone before getting a warning - Please note that the Rolling Spider firmware update should be done directly from our website : www.parrot.com/support/ 1 App, 3 Parrot Drones! Get FreeFlight 3, the free and official control app to pilot the Parrot Drones (Bebop Drone, Jumping Sumo and Rolling Spider).  SUPER-INTUITIVE – Piloting Parrot drones have never been easier thanks to the adjustable interface, which is able to adapt to the connected drone.FreeFlight 3 is equipped with an intuitive tactile control interface, adapted for beginners that allows you to jump, fly and roll like a pro within minutes! Easily control the Parrot drones by leaning your smartphone/tablet in the direction you want your drone to fly!  EASY PAIRING - Freeflight 3 App automatically detects the type of Parrot drone you are piloting. How to connect to Bebop Drone: Switch on the drone, activate the Wi-Fi of your tablet/smartphone. In the network menu, select “Bebop”. Launch FreeFlight 3. How to connect to Rolling Spider: Switch on the drone, activate the Bluetooth of your tablet/smartphone and launch FreeFlight 3. Turn on the drone, activate your Tablet/Smartphone’s Bluetooth and launch FreeFlight 3. How to connect to Jumping Sumo: Switch on the drone, activate the Wi-Fi of your tablet/smartphone. In the network menu, select “Jumping Sumo”. Launch FreeFlight 3. ACROBATIC FIGURES – Parrot Bebop drone is a lightweight, yet robust quadricopter, equipped with a 14 megapixel "fisheye" camera. Once on the welcome screen, you will access the following functionalities: Piloting, photos/videos, flight plan, Cloud "Pilot Academy"... You can also complete user settings for altitude and speed, piloting mode (accelerometer, virtual joystick...). FreeFlight app also includes fun features such as one-touch Flip! Parrot Jumping Sumo is a responsive robot with a personality! It rolls, rushes, zigzags, circles, takes turns at 90° and, in a flash, jumps up to 80cm in height and length! Jumping Sumo offers 3 piloting modes: Auto-Balance, Kicker and Jumper. You can roll and jump anywhere! Parrot Rolling Spider is an ultra-compact flying drone with impressive agility. It flies indoors and outdoors with great speed and stability. It rips through the air, flips and thanks to its removable wheels, rolls from floor to ceiling! With Rolling Spider and FreeFlight 3, you can be rapid, agile, perform aerobatics and 90° (and 180°) turns thanks to the “swipe” control feature! VIDEO & PHOTO – Parrot Bebop Drone photo and video stream is synchronized in real time on your smartphone. Share your best shots instantly on Facebook or Picassa. Showcase your flights on Youtube with the touch of a finger. Jumping Sumo is equipped with a wide-angle camera that streams the video on the screen of the piloting Smartphone or the Tablet. You discover the world at the height of the Jumping Sumo and explore areas that were inaccessible until now. It can also take pictures and videos which are stored on a micro-USB stick (not included) plugged directly into the robot.The vertical camera of Rolling Spider can be used to take snapshots. DRONE ACADEMY - Connect to Parrot Cloud to share your stats with other pilots. Keep track of all your sessions and share your photos, videos and navigation data with other members of the Parrot Cloud. Connect to share instantly to YouTube or Facebook. Join Pilot Academy with over 150,000 pilots registered. Free backup of your sessions and acrobatics data. The Parrot Skycontroller provides different piloting modes, and is compatible with most FPV glasses of last generation and accompanies this immersive experience with a co-piloting functionality for safer flights. For an overview on piloting the drones, check out our tutorial videos.
release_text: 3.5.10 - Improve Drone discovery on Android version > 4.1 - Fix bug that prevents GPS Path from being displayed in Academy - Fix crash that occurred on device running Android version < 4.1 - Fix crash when trying to use joypad mode for Rolling Spider on device which do not have video autofocus

description: Landscape Photography made easy. Find the top photography locations and predict the position of the sun and moon. -- Being in the right place at the right time! -- Pashadelic is the best crowd sourced ‘photo location’ community and forum with Nikon, Canon, and other DSLR photographers to discover the great locations to take landscape photography on the App Store! Sign up is required to join in our community. -- What can pashadelic solve your problems? -- All geotagging photos will help you to bring at the location where it was taken. You can find and go to the place where you want to take beautiful landscape photography. Location and time is one of the most important factors to take amazing photography. We believe sharing these locations and Exif infomation will improve your life of photography. DSLR photographers get together and share their favorite spots to take awesome photos. ・・ Example of Solution 1：Photography of Domestic Popular landmarks and photographic subjects ・・ Do you know where is the best place to take Golden Gate Bridge in San Francisco? Travelers may say “from Vista Point” Photographers may say “Marine Headlands” and local may say “Baker Beach”. Also you may want to know which season and what time is the best timing to shoot these popular landmarks. ・・ Example of Solution 2：Want to be inspired by looking other landscape photos? ・・ Mostly just looking by beautiful photographs will help you to take the next landscape photography. You can see new and popular photos in pasahdelic! Check and get inspired! ・・ Direction of Sunset, Sunrise, Moonset, Moonrise ・・ Go to our website to check the right time to shoot your best pictures and images. You can find the right time and direction of Sunset, Sunrise, Moonset, and Moonrise. www.pasahdelic.com -- App Features -- + Free: 100% free access to a crowd-sourced database of over 70,000 existing photo-spots in the world. + Upload photos: Upload photos with location information to show your photo spots. You also can upload photos with no location information by mapping the photos manually or upload photos from our website: www.pashadelic.com + Compatible with Map app: Check the route and go to the exact location where the photos were taken. + Wanna Snap!: Wanna snap is your wish list to keep your dream photo locations to take photographs in the future. Your wish list will help you to remember them. + Search Engine: Search landmarks and your next destination to travel and discover great locations to take photographs. You also can see photo locations around you by using “Nearby” + Social Aspect: Social interaction with other pashadelics through “Like” “Wanna Snap” “Comments” and “Follow” to have more fun with your photography life. + New Photos: Hot and New pages show the popular photos in the community and new photos which were taken by other users. __ Compatibility __ Android: 2.2 or later" +++！CEO Commitment！+++ Your voice is important! Pashadelic grows with your voice! We would like to reflect your voice to the new version of pashadelic as much as possible. Please feel free to contact us! You can reach to us by the following official accounts. --Official Twitter Account-- Follow and treet to us @pashadelic --Official FacebookPage-- https://www.facebook.com/pashadelic Your photos will be selected to be posted on our facebook page. Upload your photos on www.pashadlei.com or from our app! --Send Feedbacks by Email-- You can send feedback directly to us from the app. From “Me” page, click “edit setting” and go to “Provide Feedback” We are looking forward to seeing you in our app!

You can make your own anaglyph stereoscopic 3D pictures without "3D camera". Make It 3D is a "3D" app that makes normal image to 3D image. Make It 3D app generates anaglyph 3D photo from phone's camera or gallery. Make It 3D app can make anaglyph stereo pictures with only one camera. With Make It 3D app, you don't need "3D" smartphone which has "3D camera" to generate stereophotographs. You can manually adjust intermediate stereogram by watching superimposed left and right pictures like stereoscope. 3D glasses are required to (red/cyan) see anaglyph stereoscopy. 3D glasses with black lenses such as the ones from 3D TV will not work. These 3D glasses will not work. - Polarized 3D glasses (LG 3D TV, movie theater) - Active shutter 3D glasses (Samsung 3D TV, Sony 3D TV) Only anaglyph 3D glasses (red/cyan lenses) will work! You can get anaglyph 3D glasses from amazon, e-bay, or local comics store. Share your own 3D image with your friends or our Facebook page. Facebook page http://www.facebook.com/makeit3dapp Here are sample images: http://photo3d-apps.blogspot.com/2013/03/make-it-3d-sample-images.html How to use - Select camera or gallery - Take two pictures with camera or select two pictures from gallery - Adjust pictures with arrow and rotation buttons by watching intermediate 3D image - 3D image will generated in a few seconds! Features - Create "3D" image in a few seconds! - Built-in camera with superposition mode: make aligned pictures taking easier! - Front camera support - Manual align mode: you can adjust 3D image by arrow & rotation buttons. - Automatic align mode (PRO version only) - Save 3D image (jpg) file to gallery - Export path: sdcard/MakeIt3D - More 3D options: black&white, color, Dubois, wiggle (animated GIF), side by side (parallel), side by side (cross), superposition PRO version is also available. Make It 3D PRO provides - Auto align feature - No-ad

QVprep Lite for grade 4 provides you many math and english problems with detailed answer explanations so that you can create a strong learning foundation. QVprep Lite Grade 4: Fourth grade Quantitative (Maths) and Verbal (English) Practice tests for 4th grade QVprep Lite 4 helps students in grade 4 to practice, learn and improve their knowledge in maths and english. The app has multiple choice questions with answers in 20 practice tests on quantitative (maths) and verbal (english) ability. This app is ideal to not only improve grades in school but also to prepare for tests conducted by schools for admission into their high cap and gifted programs. Verbal (english) ability practice tests are on grade 4 level verbal analogy and analogies, antonyms, synonyms, reading comprehension, vocabulary and word meanings. Quantitative (maths) ability practice tests are on grade 4 level maths covering addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, place values, mixed operations, variables and equations, statistics, probability, fractions, mixed numbers, decimals, percentage, ratio, geometry, perimeter, area, measurement, time and money calculation, variables, mental maths, puzzles, logic and reasoning. The QVprep Lite grade 4 app has ten practice tests each in quantitative and verbal ability. Each practice test has sample multiple choice questions for you to try out. If you answer wrong, the correct answer with detailed explanation is displayed which improves learning. If you like the app, you can buy the paid version QVprep 4. This app is FREE and is for kids in grade 4. The app enables you to perfect your maths and english skills on the go on your smart phones and tablets. PJP Consulting LLC * Our mission is to develop educational apps for every subject, every country, every school and college so that today's modern technology like smart phones and tablets is used for education and learning of school, college and academic curriculum. * This app is ideal for accelerated learning and improves your verbal reasoning and math fundamentals * Attempt questions and quiz that pose challenge in a test prep environment * With no games, this tutor on mathematics and english reading presents challenging questions in a workbook / worksheet format * Ideal for testing, learning, training, and tutoring for students http://www.QVprep.com

description: Do you have a little ballerina about that adores dancing shoes and tutu’s? Then twinkle sprinkle some dancing delight into your little ballerina’s life with the Ballet Games & Ballet Moves Activity App! Your little ballerina will have a spectacular time playing with ballet puzzles, ballerina games AND interactive flashcards that dance and play beautiful ballet music for your little ones delight in this ballet app for kids designed for ages 2 & up. When you download the Ballet Toddler Activity App you’ll get a world of ballerina fun with: 8 INTERACTIVE FLASHCARDS W/ BALLERINA MOVES AND MUSIC 8 BALLERINA Puzzles 3 BALLET Match Games NEW Cupcake Fun Game Ballet Flashcards with BALLERINA DANCE MOVES and MUSIC The toddler ballet games activity app features 8 awesome interactive ballerina flashcards! When your little one taps a ballet flashcard that shows dancers doing ballet moves including a pirouette, arabesque, attitude, pas de deux, and more the flashcard will take them to another page where the dancer is actually performing the ballet dance move! Then when they tap that dancer they will hear lovely ballet musicbox music and the name of the ballet move in French, as it used in the real dance world. It’s an interactive ballet delight and age appropriate for everyone, especially first time app users, and playing with the ballet school games interactive dance moves will also encourage: -Early language skills. -Fine motor skills. -Ballet knowledge! Ballerina Puzzles The next layer of fun in the ballerina kids games free activity app are the delightfully adorable ballet puzzles that will keep ages 4 & up happy dappy! Little ballerinas will love the dancing puzzles that include a speacial Christmas Nutcracker puzzle AND a Halloween Ballet puzzle! And playing the ballet kid puzzles will also promote: -Fine motor skills -Reasoning and concept development. -Memory and recognition skills. -Hand eye coordination. -Early math concepts. -Color recognition and vocabulary. *Some other fun ways to let your little ballerinas under the age of 4 play with the puzzles also is: 1. Count the flowers, point shoes, crowns, balloons, and the other cute things in the pictures. Ask what color they are, what’s bigger or smaller, and what’s on the top and bottom of each picture. 2. Let them tap randomize, slide a few pieces and then tap the back button. This is a simple way to introduce them to using the ballerina toddler app, develop fine motor skills, and it’s very entertaining for them to see the puzzles scramble. Ballerina Matching Games The next layers of tutu fun in the ballet for toddler games that are free activity app is the 2 different toddler ballerina match games! The ballerina match game and the ballet fun shoes & tutu’s match game are truly delightful, entertaining and designed for ages 2 & up, and playing these ballet dancing games will also encourage: -Recognition and memory skills -Fine motor skills Design Team: Nancy, Thomas, Deborah, Angelina, and Sam. Twirl and spin into some delight-filed ballerina fun with the Ballet Games & Ballet Moves Activity App and let your child have fun learning through play with a Play n’ Learn App! There is an AD FREE Version of this Ballet Dancing Activity App available on Google Play.

If you can score a 180+ on this IQ Test, you are a true genius! This is the premium version of 'IQ Test - How smart are you?' by Plonk Games. If you always wanted wondered about your intelligence quotient, this app is just the right thing for you. This app tests you on verbal ability, logical reasoning and quantitative aptitude, among several other factors. The questions may not be the same each time you take a test, so it is very difficult to cheat! #Test Mode In the 'Test Mode' you get a time of 10 minutes to answer 15 questions. The difficulty of the questions depends on the age group you fall in, so be prepared! You can mark a question if you feel you need to have a second look at it later. Your IQ score is calculated based on the number of questions you answered correctly, their difficulty, and your age. #Beast Mode This is the mother of all beasts! Take your brain cells jogging (or rather sprinting) on this timed knockout test! The rules are simple - there is no 'Next', 'Previous' or 'Skip'. To proceed, you have to answer the current question correctly, within the specified time. There are no second chances here - the moment you answer incorrectly, its 'Game Over'! For each answer, you will get points, depending on the difficulty of the question, and the amount of time taken to answer! Try to make your score unbeatable! #Answers After completing the test in either modes, you can view the answers of the test you just gave. This feature is a premium feature and is only available in 'IQ Test - Ultimate!'. The answers contain appropriate explanations to each question, so you can better understand where and how you went wrong. After all, to err is human! #Features - Detailed answers after each test (Premium feature) - Completely ad-free (Premium feature) - Smooth and visually pleasing user interface - Randomized questions on both 'Test Mode' and 'Beast Mode' - Detailed instructions for both modes - A list of 5 all time high scores for both modes - Review the progress of your test at any time - Flexible navigation through the test #Requirements: - Android version 2.2 or above We would really appreciate your suggestions for future updates. :) Note - This is the ad-free version. We also have a free version which is supported with ads. You can get the free version of our IQ Test app here - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.plonkgames.apps.iq_test Each IQ Test - including this app - has its own way of evaluating IQ. This is by no means a fully accurate evaluation of your intelligence quotient. This app is just a way of learning and having fun in the process. Have fun!
release_text: # Options are shuffled, so that even if a question is repeated, it becomes slightly difficult to guess the answer # Fixed display issues for tablets and some other devices # Added quick links to our Facebook page so that our users can stay updated! :) # We are working on the question pool, and translating it to multiple languages too, so stay tuned!

description: With Busit!, get in, get what you want to know, and get where you want to go. Busit is a beautiful, comprehensive, and easy to use bus navigation app for navigating more than 100 bus systems. Busit! uses all real-time predictions, no out-of-date schedules like other apps. Busit! enables you to explore interactive transit maps, see real-time bus locations, and access Nextbus™ and TranLoc™ arrival times and transit predictions at your selected stop. The primary benefits of this app over similar apps (such as "iNextBus", "SmartRide", "Transit App", "Transit!", and "Moovit" are the speed to relevant information, the simplicity of the interface, and the heavily visually interface closely linking the information to the maps. Busit! Features: • Quickly get transit arrival times for selected stops • See actual bus locations • Save your favorite bus stops and bus agencies for quick access next time. • Use GPS to find your location and the closest bus stops to you. description: Englisch für Kinder - Vokabeltrainer, Englisch Vokabeltrainer für kleine Kinder Lernen Sie über 500 englischen gewaltlose Vokabeln. Der Unterricht ist auch für kleine Kinder geeignet. Die Kinder brauchen im Grunde kein Lesen, denn die ganze Bedienung gibt es nur über Bilder, die ein bestimmtes Wort darstellen. Jedes Wort wurde durch einen Muttersprachler in Deutsch und Englisch aufgenommen und während des Unterrichts sieht man den englischen Text. Dieses Englisch ist auf Reisen sehr praktisch, denn es enthält auch Kategorien wie Flugzeug, Stadt, Geschäfte, Nahrungsmittel, Krankenhaus, Meer und andere… Die ersten sechs Lektionen gibt es ganz kostenlos. Weitere Lektionen gibt es für die geringe Gebühr von 1,0 EUR. http://www.pmq-software.com/sw/de/lernspiele/ Programmbeschreibung: Zuerst wählen Sie Vokabelkategorie und dann eine von drei weiteren Möglichkeiten: 1. Erkennt Man sieht sechs Bilder und es wird ein gesuchtes Wort englisch ausgesprochen. Falls Sie das richtige Bild für ein vorgegebenes Wort wählen, setzen Sie in der Unterricht fort. Falls Sie das Wort nicht erraten, dann wird dieses Wort nochmals in die Unterricht eingefügt. Falls Sie nicht wissen, gibt es hier die Hilfemöglichkeit über die Fragezeichentaste. 2. Ansieh Hier sieht man alle Karten und man kann zwischen ihnen auswählen. Unter jeder Karte gibt es einen deutschen und einen englischen Text und über die Fähnchentaste kann man das Textlesen auslösen. 3. Pexeso Als Bonus wird das Erholungsspiel Pexeso geboten. Hier gibt es immer 10 zufällig gewählte Kartenpaare aus der gewälten Lektion. Die gedrehten Karten sind auf der Fläche verteilt und man dreht sie zu zweit. Das Spielziel ist, alle Paare mit möglichst wenigen Versuchen zu finden. Keywords: Englische Vokabeln, English English for Kids - Vocabulary, English Vocabulary Builder for small children Learn over 500 English-violent vocabulary. The lessons are also suitable for small children. The children need basically no reading, because the whole operation, there are only about images that represent a particular word. Every word was recorded by a native speaker in German and English during classes you can see the English text. This English is traveling very convenient, because it also includes categories such as aircraft, town, shops, food, hospital, and other sea ... The first six lessons there is absolutely free. More lessons are available for the small fee of 1.0 EUR. http://www.pmq-software.com/sw/de/lernspiele/ Program description: First select vocabulary category and then one of three other options: . 1 Detects We see six images and an target word spoken English. If you choose the right picture for a given word, continue in the classroom. If you do not guess the word, then that word is also incorporated into the lessons. If you do not know, there is the opportunity to help on the question mark button. . 2 Ansieh Here you can see all the cards and you can choose between them. Under each card there is a German and an English text and the flag button, you can invoke the text reading. . 3 Pexeso As a bonus, the rest playing Pairs is offered. There are always 10 randomly selected pairs of cards from the gewälten lesson. The rotated cards are distributed on the surface and turning them in pairs. The aim of the game is to find all pairs with as few attempts. Keywords: English vocabulary, English

app_name: The 3D昆虫／カブトムシ・クワガタムシ編
description: [The 3D昆虫シリーズ] 昆虫、それは自然が創った、最も美しく奇妙な生命体です。「The 3D昆虫シリーズ」は、従来の図鑑の常識を超えた、デジタル時代の新しい未来昆虫図鑑です。 全方位360度のあらゆる角度から観察できるだけでなく、お好みの角度の画像を自由に拡大することができます。 地球上の生物の7割は昆虫と言われますが、その多くは非常に小さく、肉眼での観察が困難です。このアプリでは、まるで自分が捕まえた虫を観察しているかのように、背面から腹面まで細かく観察できることで、皆さんを素晴らしく不思議な昆虫ワールドへご案内します。自然が創ったミクロの造形美の世界をお楽しみ下さい。 [カブトムシ・クワガタムシ編 for Android] 第一弾の「カブトムシ・クワガタムシ編 for Android」では、世界の代表的な18種を厳選し収録しました。子供から大人まで大人気の、昆虫の王様であるカブトムシ・クワガタムシ。その長い角や大顎の魅力を、様々な角度からご覧いただけます。また、迫力のある飛んだ姿を見ることのできる種類もあります。 カブトムシは世界に約2000種、クワガタムシは世界に約1400種が知られています。今回はその中から、大型でカッコいい種類、人気の高い種類を厳選しました。以下のカブトムシ9種とクワガタムシ9種を収録しています。 〔カブトムシ掲載種〕 コーカサスオオカブト Chalcosoma caucasus モーレンカンプオオカブト Chalcosoma moellenkampi ヘルクレスオオカブト Dynastes hercules オオゴホンヅノカブト Eupatorus gracilicornis クラビゲールタテヅノカブト Golofa claviger エアクスタテヅノカブト Golofa eacus ストゥベリヒサシカブト Megaceras stuebeli エレファスゾウカブト Megasoma elephas マルタバニメンガタカブト Trichogomphus martabani 〔クワガタムシ掲載種〕 ローゼンベルグオウゴンオニクワガタ Allotopus rosenbergii コガシラクワガタ Chiasognathus granti メタリフェルホソアカクワガタ Cyclommatus metallifer マンディブラリスフタマタクワガタ Hexarthrius mandibularis メンガタクワガタ Homoderus mellyi ヨーロッパミヤマクワガタ Lucanus cervus タランドゥスオオツヤクワガタ Mesotopus tarandus フェモラリスツヤクワガタ Odontorabis femoralis ギラファノコギリクワガタ Prosopocoilus giraffa [動作確認機種] 　・GALAXY S SC-02B 　・GALAXY NEXUS SC-04D 　・AQUOS PHONE SH-12C 　・Xperia acro SO-02C

- 업데이트 안내 - 2013-06월 새로운 LCN 속도측정 애플리케이션이 찾아옵니다. 더욱더 정확해진 속도측정 결과 및 성능이 향상된 속도측정 서버로 돌아오겠습니다. ------------------------- LCN 속도측정 애플리케이션은 모바일 속도측정 애플리케이션으로 언제 어디서나 와이파이 환경을 비롯한 3G,와이브로,4G LTE 등의 환경에서 속도측정을 쉽고 빠르게 이용할 수 있습니다. ■ 모바일 속도측정 및 위치측정 기능 - 와이파이 망은 기본, LG의 3G 망을 포함한 3G/4G LTE/와이브로 등 여러 망 측정 가능 - 보다 더 정확한 다운로드, 업로드, 지연시간 측정 - 타사 애플리케이션과는 다르게 지연시간은 실제 인터넷 접속 지연시간으로 측정(NOT PING!) ■ 측정내역 확인 - 단말기에서 언제든지 이전 측정내역 확인 가능. ■ 모든 측정통계 기능 - 다른 사람들이 측정한 데이터를 비롯한 모든 측정내용을 한꺼번에 수집하여 평균속도 등의 데이터를 제공. 키워드: 2G,CDMA,3G,HSPA,HSUPA,HSDPA,HSPA,HSPA+,HSPAP,LTE,4G,와이브로,WiBro,LTE워프,워프,Warp,명품LTE,명품,U+,SK,KT,올레,olleh,LTE속도측정,LTE 속도측정,LCN,LTE Coverage Now,LCN SpeedTest,LCN 속도측정,LCN속도측정,속도측정,속도,측정,인터넷,인터넷 속도측정,인터넷속도측정,네트워크,network,speedtest.net,speedtest ---- 개발자 연락처 : 경기도 안산시 어딘가 전화번호 010-xxxx-xxxx
release_text: 버전 1.1 변경사항(기존: 1.1 에서 변경된 사항) - 일부 단말에서 속도측정 후 UI 에 배경이 나오지 않는 현상 수정(테스트 안됨) - 속도측정 기록보기에서 단말 고유코드가 다른 코드와 중복되어 나타나는 현상 수정(단, 이전기록 초기화) - 메모리 점유율 점프하는 현상 수정 버전 1.0 변경사항(기존: 1.0a 에서 변경된 사항) - 속도측정 정확도 향상(SpeedTest Library 1.1.1-beta) - 핑테스트 중 네트워크 불안정해지는 문제 해결 - 앱이 실행중인 경우 화면이 꺼지지 않도록 설정 - 최소값/최대값 계산버그 해결 - 평균 계산 잘못하는 문제 해결 - 속도측정 결과창에 연결된 네트워크 망 & 속도측정에 사용된 데이터 양 표시(기준: MB)

description: Reading Log helps users log their reading activities. Can be used by all ages, especially helps parents to improve their kids reading. Features: Supports multiple users. Reading activities(Book name, date and time spent) can be added per user. Reading activities can be viewed as daily/weekly/monthly reports. Reading activities can be searched using book name/ date duration. The search result can be mailed to the user. Has ISBN scanner in the "Add Activity" screen. This scanner can be used to retrieve the book name by scanning the ISBN bar code. Bug Fix(Sep-28-2012): "Add Reading Log" error is fixed. Please update. Changes (Sep-16-2012): Added Timer. Users can click on the clock/timer image on the "Add Reading Log" screen to start the timer. Timer has Start,Stop and Reset buttons. Thirty plus seconds will be rounded to a minute. Brought back "Pages Read" field based on user request. This field is optional. Errors Fixed. Apostrophe in book name caused the application to crash. This error is fixed now. Sorry for the inconvenience. Changes:Oct-27-2012 Edit & Delete Entries: i) Edit an entry -- An entry can be edited by clicking on the entry from the "View Report" screen. ii) Delete an entry -- An entry can be deleted by long pressing(click on the item a little longer than usual tap) an entry from the "View Report" screen. iii) Both "Minutes Read" & "Pages Read" fields are made optional.
release_text: Update : Feb-11-2012 : Email feature is available now!. Please click on the "Search Entry" and search for your desired dates. On the search result page, you will see an Email field and "Send" button, Upon clicking "Send" you will get a popup showing email clients(Gmail/Yahoo etc). Select the one you would like to use. Upon choosing the desired client, the report file will be attached to the email. After receiving the email, please download the attachment to view the file with formatting.

description: Ti informa DOVE e QUANDO cacciare in base al CALENDARIO VENATORIO. Ti avvisa se varchi i confini di una delle quasi 7000 AREE PROTETTE ITALIANE: SIC-ZSC, ZPS, EUAP, RAMSAR, IBA e la ZPE (Zona di Protezione Esterna) del Parco Nazionale dell'Abruzzo, Lazio e Molise. Con la versione PRO sono disponibili tutte le mappe di tutte le Regioni Italiane in formato vettoriale (massimo dettaglio e altissimo livello di zoom), con le indicazioni sugli ATC, il TRACKING dei percorsi effettuati, la consultazione dei CALENDARI VENATORI con le SPECIE CACCIABILI in tempo reale. Inoltre sul sito xcaccia.it puoi accedere alla tua area personale con l'archivio storico dei percorsi di caccia su mappa e molte altre risorse utili. XCaccia è pensata per essere “utilizzata sul campo”, non richiede l'accesso continuo ad Internet e neanche la copertura di rete. E' un progetto nato dalle esigenze del cacciatore che desidera vivere la sua passione in armonia con la natura rispettando le regole del mondo venatorio. We'll notify WHERE and WHEN hunt based on the CALENDAR HUNTING. Alerts you if the boundaries of one of the gates almost 7000 ITALIAN PROTECTED AREAS: SIC-SAC, SPA, EUAP, RAMSAR, IBA and the ZPE (Outer Protection Zone) of the National Park of Abruzzo, Lazio and Molise. With the PRO version are available all maps of all the Italian regions in vector format (maximum detail and high level of zoom), with the directions on the ATC, the TRACKING mileage, consulting CALENDARS HUNTING with huntable species in time real. Also on site xcaccia.it you can access your personal area with the historical paths of hunting on the map and many other useful resources. XCaccia is meant to be "used in the field", does not require continuous access to the Internet and even network coverage. It 'a project born from the needs of the hunter who wants to live his passion in harmony with nature, respecting the rules of the hunting world.
release_text: - Gestione cartografie aggiunte dagli ATC in convenzione. - Migliorato controllo e precisione gps. - Nuova gestione legende e aree protette. - Bug fix.

description: - VOICE AND TEXT TRANSLATOR, DICTIONARY AND PHRASEBOOK - FAST ONE-TAP TRANSLATION - FROM ENGLISH INTO GERMAN, SPANISH, PORTUGUESE, FRENCH, RUSSIAN AND VICE VERSA - FROM GERMAN INTO RUSSIAN, SPANISH, PORTUGUESE, FRENCH AND VICE VERSA 100% OFFLINE German translator, phrasebook, and dictionary—right at your fingertips! This translator is ideal for business, travel and education. The English<->German language package is already included in the app; other languages are available through in-app purchases. ► Translation without the Internet 100% offline translator (an Internet connection is required for the translation of web pages only). Download the app into your device and don’t worry about finding a Wi-Fi hotspot or high roaming charges. ► High-quality Translation Advanced PROMT technology provides excellent translation, even in offline mode. For the most popular topics, including studies, correspondence, social networking, and travel, readymade settings are already included in the interface. Choose the appropriate topic in the app and get the exact translation of words, phrases, whole sentences, websites and SMS texts! ►Fast One-Tap Translation You only need to select and copy a word or a text in any app on your device. The translation will appear instantly in the notification area. ► Modern Travel Phrasebooks Download phrasebooks, with ready-made sentences for just about any situation. ► Advanced Dictionaries View dictionary results for single words! You can get translation from different dictionaries, as well as information about parts of speech and transcription. Listen to how words and their translations are pronounced by native speakers ► Voice Translator Simply speak a word or phrase and listen to its translation! Highly recommended while traveling and language learning. ► Translation History View and select the 1000 previously translated words and phrases. ► Moderate Size This app takes up only a little bit of a mobile device’s memory: from 30 to 250 MB for one language pair (depending on language and installed components). Text translator should be installed; dictionary and phrasebook can be downloaded separately for free. Love our German Offline Translator? Please rate us on Google Play. We’re always trying to improve our app. If you have any questions or suggestions, please share them with us support@promt.com !
release_text: ● More convenient work with texts from clipboard and voice input. ● Translation history is increased up to 1000 records ● Better visualization of translations ● Translate just by clicking Enter button ● To make a comment or to report about a problem became even simpler ● Use the settings to deactivate or activate again ‘Translate by Pressing Enter’ feature ● The cursor is positioned in the text field right after text deletion ● When clearing History the confirmation dialog box appears

Export Development Canada, the Department of Foreign Affairs and International Trade, along with other federal and provincial partners, work to support Canadian trade through matchmaking activities. These are introductions that bring two foreign and Canadian companies parties together in order to create business opportunities, typically during a trade show or commercial mission, where we have detailed knowledge of the foreign buyer’s needs, and we are able to match those needs with specific Canadian capabilities tailored to the opportunities in question. This mobile app will enhance these activities by providing a platform to maintain key information about foreign and Canadian companies who participate in specific industry events. The app will also match companies based on country and industry information, allowing each company to build a potential prospect list.

The Manufacturing Innovation Event is the premier educational event for the manufacturing industry. Sponsored by the Manufacturing Extension Partnership Program, the event annually brings together representatives of government, industry and partnering organizations to showcase U.S. manufacturing. Targeted towards manufacturing practitioners, manufacturers and MEP Centers the event provides access to educational sessions, industry trends, keynote speakers and networking opportunities. The MI 2012 App will provide you access to session information, networking opportunities, speaker bios, presentations and other important conference updates.

A game challenges your brain. Simply speaking, for arbitrary 4 cards from a poker except Jokers, players is required to count 24 points upon these 4 cards only through plus(+), minus(-), multiplication(x) and division(/), where A=1, J=11, Q=12, K=13. For example, given 4 cards: 7, Q, K and 7, in that case, there may be a few solutions, e.g. (7x7)-(13+12) is such one. 1. Touch any two cards and one of arithmetic signs to compute points (no matter what touching order). The result derives a new card called a composite card. 2. Long click on a composite card to undo. 3. description: This application is a remote control to watch movies from your Raspberry Pi. It connects to the Raspberry using SSH and uses omxplayer to reproduce the movies. The differences between this version and the free version are: - this version has no adds - Added some configuration options (you can configure if you want to adjust the framerate and resolution to the TV and if you want the audio to use the standard output or HDMI) - This version has buttons to change the speed (ideal to fast forward the intros) and a button to turn off the raspberry - This version has the option to change the audio language if the video has more than one. - Added subtitles menu that allows to turn On/Off the subtitles, to add/adjust a delay in the subtitles and to change the subtitles stream if there is more than one. If the subtitles don't work please download the last omxplayer version from: https://github.com/torarin/omxplayer/downloads or type "wget https://github.com/downloads/torarin/omxplayer/omxplayer_3~experimental~git20121208~ebfa6fc6_armhf.deb " And type "sudo dpkg -i omxplayer_3~experimental~git20121208~ebfa6fc6_armhf.deb" If the subtitles don't work with this version try assigning more memory to the GPU running "sudo raspi-config" Any problems or questions please contact me at raspberryremote@gmail.com
release_text: Fixed disconnection problem when other apps are running while reproducing video

description: Space shooter different from others of it's genre.
