In the future humans achieved peace and abandoned their weapons to research new technologies and colonize the empty space. But the space is not empty, it never was. Become a Drone Pilot on a war against the invading armada of Aliens against the human research colony Hera IV. Fly and upgrade your drones in breathtaking space combats and bomb your way through enemy bases. You and Hera IV are the only defense to save mankind from oblivion. Suit up and fight! If you like games like Air Attack, Galaga, Xelorians, 1942, 1943, Siberian Strike, iFighter, Air Strike, Flying Shark, DoDonPachi, Espgaluda, Swiv, Sky Force, Warblade, this game is for you. Video Poker Strategy Trainer - Double Bonus This is the popular Double Bonus video poker game with a strategy analysis engine built-in to help you train to become a better player. After each hand is dealt, the strategy engine calculates all possible outcomes to determine the best cards to hold to get the highest payoff. You can click 'Hint' to view the results or you can play without hints. If you did not hold the optimal cards, a popup message will inform you of the error and you will see which cards were optimal. Statistics on the number of errors you make will be tracked as you improve your play. Special Features: Hint - Tells you which cards to hold Strategy Check - Informs you if you did not hold the right cards Statistics - Tracks how well your are playing Log File - tracks all your plays so you can review later Disclaimer: Strategy assumes maximum bet. This game is for entertainment purposes only. No guarantee of strategy accuracy. Support: Feel free to email if you have any issues.

description: The "Frankenstein" Android Librivox Audio Book App! Frankenstein (1831) by Mary Shelley A mentally unstable genius, Victor Frankenstein, inspired by the dreams of ancient alchemists and empowered by modern science, creates a humanoid but fails to nurture and educate it after it comes to life. It wanders alone into a hostile world, where fear of its size and ugliness subjects it to violence and ostracism, which in time it learns to blame upon its maker. As compensation for its suffering, it demands that he create a companion with whom to share its outcast life. Moved by the creature's account of its sufferings, the scientist agrees, but a long period of procrastination awakens doubts that ultimately cause him to break his promise. In retaliation, the creature begins a campaign of vengeance. Although its serious crimes are limited to those which will wound his maker's heart, Victor imagines much more widespread harm, supposing the human race itself to be the creature's intended victim. There then follows a chase into the frozen north, which the creature prolongs so as to destroy his pursuer by exposure and exhaustion. This story, narrated by Victor, forms a frame surrounding the creature's tale of its wanderings, education, and unhappy encounters with human beings. Victor's narrative is itself framed within a series of letters written by the young mariner who rescues him from an iceberg while engaged in his own ambitious scientific endeavor, searching for the North Pole. This novel was begun while the author and her lover, Percy Shelley, were in hiding from her father and Percy's wife on the shores of Lake Geneva, where they were the frequent house guests of Lord Byron. The young people all began to write "ghost" stories, but only Mary's was destined to enjoy success. The novel was published in 1818. Percy contributed a preface and later made extensive emendations. After his death Mary herself thoroughly revised the text and published it again in 1831. This is the text read in this project. (Summary by Thomas Copeland) }}} Total running time: 8:44:47 Read by Thomas A. Copeland. Chapters: 00: Intro & Preface 01: Letter 1 02: Letter 2 03: Letter 3 04: Letter 4 05: Chapter 01 06: Chapter 02 07: Chapter 03 08: Chapter 04 09: Chapter 05 10: Chapter 06 11: Chapter 07 12: Chapter 08 13: Chapter 09 14: Chapter 10 15: Chapter 11 16: Chapter 12 17: Chapter 13 18: Chapter 14 19: Chapter 15 20: Chapter 16 21: Chapter 17 22: Chapter 18 23: Chapter 19 24: Chapter 20 25: Chapter 21 26: Chapter 22 27: Chapter 23 28: Chapter 24 The Android App "Frankenstein Audio Book" is a full featured media player with: Selectable Table of Contents to allow to jump to the start of any of the chapters. Adjustable Progress Bar to allow to jump to any spot in the current playing chapter Previous Chapter Button Rewind Button Play / Pause Button Fast Forward Button Next Chapter Button The "Frankenstein Audio Book" App will not use up your data plan's minutes by downloading the audio files (mp3) over and over. You will download load all the data when you install the App. The "Frankenstein Audio Book" App works even in airplane mode and in places without Wi-Fi or phone network access! So you can listen to your audio book anywhere anytime! The "Frankenstein Audio Book" App automatically pauses when you make or receive a phone call and automatically resumes after the call ends. The "Frankenstein Audio Book" App will continue to play until you exit the App or pause the reading so it is perfect for listening in bed, at the gym, or while driving into work.

You have participated in a group event. Everything went well and you feel happy. You and some other participants have paid some money for the group during the event. Do you find keeping track the payments troublesome? What's more, calculating the settlement amount of each member and showing them how the amounts are arrived are often even more difficult. Now, our Android Application Payments Tracker can help. The Payments Tracker is an easy to use and handy application if you participate in some group events/activities, and costs of the events are not settled by each member immediately after each payment. A typical example is a tour of several days. Main features of the application: * Multiple events can be defined. * Multiple currencies in each event are supported. * Flexible splitting of payment amounts to members * Import / export of payment records to/from external files * Use exported payment records to create new event * 3 types of reports (individual member, group summary, full payment list) * Reports can be exported to external files for further distribution * No advertisement link, no network connection required Supported Language: English, Chinese (Traditional and Simplified). Devices of other locales will show the app in English. Visit our web site to get more information, sample screens and complete user manual! If you encounter problems using the app, please report to us via email or our web site and we will try our best to help. Version History 1.0 : 09Sep2011 1.0.1 : 02Oct2011 1.1 : 17Oct2011 1.1.1 : 01Jul2012 (for Android Version 2.3 or above) 1.1.2 : 23Sep2012 (for Android Version 2.3 or above)

Help Switch the courageous firefly run, fly, shoot and rescue his captured firefly friends. Firefly Runner is an action packed, free-running adventure set on the stunningly beautiful yet treacherous Firefly Island. Join Switch as he takes flight in search of treasured light orbs and magical keys. After lift-off avoid obstacles, collect cherries and perform acrobatic loop-de-loops to gain extra points. You will be flying towards higher and higher scores in no time! Challenge your reflexes by running, flying and firing your deadly slingshot to take out Switch’s insect foes like grumpy hornets, burping slugs and scuttling spiders. Always make sure to keep a watchful eye for those mischievous praying mantises or else their deadly traps are likely to catch you by surprise. Keep Switch alive and you'll reach gigantic scores, unlock achievements and beat your friends on the online leaderboards! ---Features--- • Run, fly and shoot through a stunningly beautiful rendered forest world. • Fun and charming 3D insect characters, including cute fireflies, grumpy hornets, burping slugs, scuttling spiders and mischievous praying mantises. • One touch gameplay that can be picked up instantly and is fun to master. • Perform acrobatic loop-de-loops to gain extra points. • Three diverse environments to explore; The Rolling Countryside, The Forbidden Forest and The Crystal Caves. • Time of day cycle going from day, to sunset then night, changing the heartbeat and mood of the game. • Unlock achievements, beat your best scores and challenge your friends. • Work your way up a range of online leaderboards to become the top Firefly! • Can you collect all of the flight badges and unlock the many achievements to become the ultimate firefly? • Stay connected with your friends via Facebook, Twitter and Google Play achievements, leaderboards and challenges. ---GamesAid and SpecialEffect--- Red Kite Games are proudly supporting GamesAid and SpecialEffect with this game and make regular donations to both video games charities. For info on how playing and sharing Firefly Runner is making a difference, please visit our website: http://redkitegames.co.uk/game/firefly-runner/ ---More Information--- http://redkitegames.co.uk/ http://redkitegames.co.uk/game/firefly-runner/ Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RedKiteGames Follow us on Twitter: @RedKiteGames **For the optimal experience we recommend closing other applications and/or restarting your device before playing this app for the first time.**

REVO Mobile for Android Remote viewing and playback software for video streaming and live monitoring of your REVO DVR/NVR video surveillance system. Secure your home or monitor your business, all remotely, from your Android mobile devices. If you have trouble installing this application please contact us at support@revoamerica.com . Features: 2-Way Audio Search View (Search) Play, Pause, Single Step (Fwd and Rev), Fast Forward, Fast Reverse, Go To End and Go To Beginning functions are available for any recorded video. Pinch Zoom in Live and Search views. Calendar Searching Allows the time and date to be entered for viewing recorded video. Event Searching Displays a list of recent events. Tapping a desired event displays the event's recorded video. Push Notification A visual and/or audio alert of an event to the Android device as it happens. The REVO Mobile application does not have to be running to receive the Push Notification alert. A REVO icon will appear at the top of the Android device's display to indicate real-time events, such as motion detection, alarm input, or DVR status alerts. Tapping the REVO icon will display a listing of the recent DVR events. Visual, audio, and vibration notification of Push Notification alerts are settable in the app Live View (Watch) - View your cameras live. Single, 2x2, 3x3 and 4x4 views are available – monitor as many as 16 cameras on a single screen. (NOTE: Live camera views are limited to 2x2 when using 3G.) Swipe to change cameras, up to 16 per DVR. Connect remotely to many DVRs at the same or different locations. Connect Android devices to DVRs using either DVRNS (the DVR's name), or using the camera's IP address. Remote DVR monitoring can be password protected for security. Named Cameras - User-friendly names can be assigned by the user to each camera. Vertical (Portrait) and Horizontal (Landscape) views are available. Transfer Speed (kb/sec) and Total Received Data values can be displayed. PTZ (Pan/Tilt/Zoom) camera direct control: Pan, Tilt, and Zoom functions are controllable directly from the mobile device using virtual arrow keys or gestures. PTZ camera focus and iris adjustments (if present on the camera) are controllable in realtime. Preset views with user-defined names can be selected and viewed from the mobile device. If you have trouble installing this application please contact us at support@revoamerica.com .
release_text: New Features (v.3.1.4) Pinch Zoom in Live and Search Modes. Support for Android v. 4.4 (KitKat). Improved DVR connection. Screen shots (jpg) can be saved in Live and Search modes. DVRs can be arranged alphabetically. Favorite DVRs can be starred. Event query filtering is now available in Search mode.

description: Are you a salad lover? Are you looking to lose some weight by eating salads? Or are you looking for some standout salad recipes? Well, no matter which category you belong to, the Salad Recipe Free application is just what you need. If there are any recipes that should be synonymous with healthy recipes, it has to be salad recipes. A variety of Salad recipes are available from all across the world. The number of these salad recipes is so high that you could make a book out of it. However, how will it feel like to carry a salads book everywhere you go? Awkward, right? Well, the Salad Recipe application overcomes this problem. Salad recipes free application gives you access to almost all of the salad recipes out there. This includes recipes such as Indian salad recipes, healthy salad recipes, soup and salad recipes, vegetarian salad recipes, fruit salad recipes and a plethora of more options. And all of these salad recipes will be at your fingertips for free. Along with this, we offer you options to user sign up. With this, you will have your own personalized version of the application that shows salad recipes according to your taste. Simple instructions are another plus point. These instructions are even readable by children and could transform them into a good salad cook as well. Salad recipe free application also has a ‘What to Cook’ Feature. With this, we help you to know which salad recipe you could cook with the ingredients that you have inside your fridge. Pictures of Salad recipes make the choosing process easier. There is a wide range of salad images in the application. Salads, being one of the easiest dishes to cook make the application more interactive. Instructions on the amount of vegetables and other ingredients for the salads are drawn out in such a way to provide the best taste possible. Range and choices of the Salad recipes that we bring for you change with the seasons as well. For instance, the application shows Salad recipes apt for rainy season when it is rain season, and shows salad recipes apt for summer when it is summer and so on. Lose weight, find a hobby or just cook your favorite salad, the application helps you do all these and more. Once again, all these features and the endless salad recipes for free. So why waste more time thinking? Download the application now and enjoy the vast world of Salad recipes which are healthy and delicious at the same time. The one stop for all the Salad Recipes is this, look no further, this is the answer to all your Salad questions.
release_text: — Introduced ‘ USER SIGNUP’ to get more personalized recipes. — Meal Planner feature to plan a recipe prior and to get reminder on the same. — 'Recipe Fork' feature to add any recipe from any recipe website or blog to your personal collection. —'What to Cook' feature to get recipes based on ingredients what you have in your fridge , just using VOICE input. — Material design.

description: Manage your cash flow directly on your smartphone and spend your money wizely. Money Manager is a simple and user friendly expense tracker. It gives you a quick and simple expense adding and editing experience. Money Manager also helps you to make home budget. Main Features: - Track and manage daily income and expense - See this month’s balance when the app starts up - Transfer between accounts - Multiple accounts - Customize accounts, categories, payer/payer - View Transactions of particular account / contact / category - View Transactions of uncategorized categories - Group By : categories, payer/payer, payment status, payment method, date - View last 8 entries - Reminder for payment : Schedule the payments and recurring payments, Payment alerts - Budget Planning : Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Yearly - Statistics - Templates : Auto fill - 90+ Currencies - Password Protection - Notes - Backup - Restore - Widget - Help - Save Search Transactions. Tools - Calculator - Currency Converter - Tip Calculator - Tax Calculator - Interest Calculator - EMI Calculator - ATM Finder - Bank Finder Permissions : - Write to SD card permission to export payments - Internet and Location permission to convert currency, locate atm and bank - Vibrate to remind payment - Call Phone permission to call contact from application Due to Android market policy, you will have only 15-minutes refund window. Please check with Demo version before purchase. Please feel free to contact " ramidi.srikanthreddy@gmail.com " if you have any questions, comments or recommendations. Unfortunately Google Play does allow to respond to the comments here, so please contact the developer directly. Thanks for your support!!

Take control of your conference calls with BT MeetMe Mobile Controller. ***Please note, you must have an active BT Conferencing MeetMe account to use the application. To set up an account please visit http://www.btconferencing.com The BT MeetMe Mobile Controller takes the stress out of conference calling by simplifying the way you schedule, access, view and control conference calls: - Schedule a call with the touch of a button - Receive an alert when the first person joins your conference and see who has joined - Join a call from any number - See who is on the call by name - Control the call, adding missing participants, muting participants with background noise, recording the call and much more! BT MeetMe Mobile Controller is simply a better way to handle your everyday conference calling needs.

Learn how to write 200 words for 2nd graders. In handwriting mode (experimental), you can write answers instead of pressing buttons. Click on words to hear sounds. You can review incorrect spellings. Review algorithm is based on latest memory retention technologies. This is an ad-supported version. Network connection required. Please also try our paid version at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rioneutron.spelling2 This is one of the Spelling K-12 series from Spelling Kindergarten to Spelling 12th Grade. All your test results are captured and analyzed for your best memory retention. There are total 6 color codes and words change colors based on your marks. By default, words are in black. If you keep getting a word incorrect, it will turn yellow, orange and finally red. If you get a word right, it will turn greener. 10 Words are grouped into a chapter. If you get all 10 words right, the chapter icon will get a check mark. In review chapter, all incorrectly spelled words will appear in priority order based on the latest memory retention technologies. If you don't have enough time, just go to the review chapter and the app will make sure that you spend the least amount of time and maximize memory retention on words. This app will help you learn words very efficiently and very effectively. Also check out our Word K-12 series.

LightTrac is a must have tool for all outdoor photographers. Quickly determine at what time and location the light conditions are perfect to shoot your subjects outdoors. The elevation and angle of Sun changes throught the year depending on the location, date and time of day, LightTrac calculates the elevation and angle of Sun or Moon for any date & time, for any place on earth and plots it on top of a satellite map. Armed with this information and with an extremely easy to use interface, you can now plan your photoshoot even several months ahead of time and position yourself at the right spot at the right time for the perfect shot. Whether you are a landscape or architecture photographer, a wedding or sports photographer you will love what LightTrac has to offer. LightTrac is not just useful to photographers, but its also useful to architects, real-estate buyers, solar panel owners/installers, gardeners, travelers or for any outdoor person interested in knowing any info about the Sun or the Moon. Features - Scout for new locations using a map for the perfect sunlight angle or for a backdrop with a rising/setting moon - Find Angle and Elevation of Sun for any location and time - Find Angle and Elevation of Moon for any location and time - Find Sunrise, Sunset and Twilight times for any day - Find Moonrise, Moonset times for any day - Search locations by address, city or zipcode - Save multiple locations and switch between them easily - Does automatic timezone detection

The Impossible Breakfast Simulator! The name says it all. It's just impossible to master this game. It's just like the other populair bird game but then you have to eat cereal at the same time! Be as precise as a surgeon in this simulator game! Use your two fingers and your one brain The controls are crazy! You have to tap on the left side and swipe on the right side. Do you have the skills to handle both at the same time? There is only one way to find out! This game is better than a baking simulator Challenge your friends via the online leaderboards! From the creator of the populair game Goat Smash! Features: - nice graphics - awesome gameplay - online leaderboards - achievements

Can't get enough of Zombies? It's ZOMBIE TOSS! The zombie chucking and exploding game! See how far you can toss the zombie. Use the mines to your advantage in order to throw your Zombie as far as he will go! Throw em and blow em up! Drag your finger back on the zombie and let him rip! Better than flossing, it's zombie tossing! If you like Zombie Toss, please check out our other Zombie game "Zombie Bubble Wrap" and stay tuned for future zombie goodness! The zombocalypse is coming!

If you're in business or are a student of business, this app could be useful for you! A Financial Calculator combined with a Scientific Calculator Financial Mode includes: * Simple Interest Mode * Compound Interest Mode (FV, PV, PMT, NPER) * Cash Flow Mode (NPV, NFV, IRR, MIRR, DPBP) * Amortization Mode (PMT, BAL, INT, PRN, ∑INT, ∑PRN) * Cost, Sales and Margin Mode * Break-Even Mode * Depreciation Mode (SL, FP, SYD, FDB, DB) * Bond Mode (PRC, YTM, YTC, Duration, Convexity) * Days Calculation Mode * Interest Conversion Mode * Options Trading (Greeks) * Exchange Rates In many cases, a graph and accompanying table showing the results is available. The table can be saved to the sd card in csv format. Full details of the formulas used in the financial calculations are available in the Help section. Scientific Mode includes: * Trigonometric Functions * Power and Root Functions * Log and Antilog Functions * Permutations and Combinations * Statistics Functions * Factorial Function * Modulus Function Separate calculation histories are available for both financial and scientific modes.
release_text: 03/20 (ver 1.1.0) * added support for Samsung Multi Window * added more currencies to the FOREX function

description: No ads ever. ONLY app with ALL Houston traffic cameras! A whooping 562 cameras come preloaded! Check the latest traffic condition of Houston's roads Traffic web cams for commuters in Houston. Ready to head home and you want to check the traffic? Live Traffic Houston is the fastest way to get to the traffic web cams that matter to you. Instead of browsing to a web site and working your way through the menus and map graphics to find a web camera just open Live Traffic Houston on your android and go straight to the camera you want with one click. Navigate through the other cameras along your route, in order, with a simple Next button. Should I stay or should I go? The traffic is slowing to a crawl. Is it going to clear quickly or is it time to bail and find a better route? Open Traffic Cam Houston, select the nearest camera with one click and then navigate through the web cams along your route to see how far the congestion continues. Cameras are maintained by Houston Transtar. Individual cameras may be inoperative due to weather conditions or maintenance requirements. NOTE: There are 562 cameras, they are grouped in the following order - IH-10 Katy, IH-10 East, IH-45 Gulf, IH-45 North, IH-610 West Loop, IH-610 North Loop, IH-610 East Loop, IH-610 South Loop, US-59 Southwest, US-59 Eastex, US-290 Northwest, SH-288, SH-249, SH-225, SH-146, SH-6, Spur-330, Nasa Rd 1, Beltway 8-North, Beltway 8-West, Beltway 8-South, Fort Bend Toll Road, Hardy Toll Road, Westpark Tollway The easiest way to use this app is to scroll down to the section you want, add the cameras you commonly use to favourites.

description: Learn to draw in 4 steps! Like a personal art teacher, it will teach you how to draw dozens of different objects and create amazing pictures. • EASY: you don't need any special skills, just start drawing • INTERESTING: try different styles of drawings • FUNNY: now you can draw nice animals, cartoon characters, cars and more • self-teaching (educational) Main features: • the app includes lots of drawings such as: cartoon characters, animals, cars, toys, planes, flowers, and much more! • each drawing is divided into 4 steps which are easy to follow. • starting from a few lines, you’ll end up with a complete picture. • You can create your own drawing and draw right on the screen. • parents can use it to give drawing lessons to their kids.

Smart Baby Games is a fun learning program for children of all ages. Contains 18 games in one: - Learning of letters and numbers sound animated. - Distinguish shapes and colors and match the pieces. - Distinguish between colors and show your ability to move animated things around the screen. - Practice your memory with learning mode. - Match the pictures and play with wooden pieces. - Learn the sounds of piano and play music. - Play puzzles with pictures of your environment. - Play with butterflies, fish and other animals. - Have lots of fun with soap bubbles and balloons. - Draw funny pictures with lots of pencils and colors. - Improve reflexes with a toy cloud. Children can have fun playing a long time. Besides the game to acquire the following skills by playing: - Improve children's skills in memory, concentration and development of knowledge of their environment. - Help with the recognition of the letters of the alphabet. - Keep the children entertained with fun sound effects and animal sounds, musical instruments and vehicles .. - The game is adapted to be handled very easily. - Is specifically designed as an educational tool for interface of preschoolers and later.

Keno is a simple lottery-like game. To play, decide how much to bet and pick 1 to 10 numbers from field of 80. How much you win depends on how many of your numbers match 20 randomly drawn numbers. How to play Keno Master: 1) To bet, tap BET- or BET+. 2) Pick 1 to 10 numbers (spots). 3) Tap PLAY and 20 random numbers will be drawn from pool of 80. 4) The amount you win depends on how many of your marked numbers match drawn numbers. The Pay Table on the left shows how much you can win. Features: * Auto Play * Auto Stop (after a big win, all spots hit, etc) * Auto Quick Pick * Quick Pick * Bet from 1 to 1 million credits! * Real-time global statistics * Real-time auto play statistics * Variable game speeds (Slow, Normal, Fast, etc) * Multiple Themes (Classic, Choco, Twilight, Zen) * Sound On/Off * Free Bonus Credits! This app is for entertainment purposes only. The game credits have no real money value. The developer of this app takes no responsibility or liability with regards to the legal requirements to use this app in the relevant jurisdiction the player resides. The use of this app is the sole responsibility of the player.

description: リバティーシティへようこそ。すべては、ここから始まった。 Rockstar Gamesの史上最も影響を与えてきたゲームが10周年を迎えます。高い評価を得てきた大ヒットタイトル『グランド・セフト・オートIII』が、モバイル機器に登場。リバティーシティの怪しげな暗黒の地下世界を多様で壮大なオープンワールドで再現。あらゆるタイプのキャラクターが出現する、この自由に探検できるゲームでは、非情でありながら魅力ある闇の犯罪世界をお手元で体験できます。 素晴らしい声の演技、ブラックユーモアのストーリー、見事なサウンドトラックと画期的なオープンワールドのゲームプレイが楽しめる『グランド・セフト・オートIII』は、一世代にわたって、オープンワールドゲームというジャンルを定義してきました。 特徴: • 視覚的に見事な最新のグラフィック、キャラクターおよび乗り物 • 高解像度 • タッチスクリーン機器向けにゲームプレイを最適化 • モバイルプラットフォーム向けのカスタム操作 • 無限大のプレイ時間 • 一部のUSBゲームパッドに対応 • Immersionの触覚/振動フィードバック機能との統合 • 新しい表示設定で視覚体験をカスタマイズ可能 対応言語: 英語、フランス語、イタリア語、ドイツ語、スペイン語、日本語 『グランド・セフト・オートIII』は、下記の機器で利用可能です。 • Androidフォン: Galaxy Nexus, HTC Rezound、LG Optimus 2x、Motorola Atrix 4G、Motorola Droid X2、Motorola Photon 4G、Samsung Galaxy R、Sony Ericsson Xperia Play、T-Mobile G2x • Androidタブレット: Acer Iconia、Asus Eee Pad Transformer、Asus Eee Pad Transformer Prime, Dell Streak 7、LG Optimus Pad、Medion Lifetab, Motorola Xoom、Samsung Galaxy Tab 8.9 and 10.1、Sony Tablet S、Toshiba Thrive 『グランド・セフト・オートIII: 10周年記念エディション』を最適にプレイするには、ダウンロード後に機器を再起動し、他のアプリケーションを終了されることを推奨します。 『グランド・セフト・オートIII: 10周年記念エディション』をインストールするには、1GB以上の空き容量を確保してください。 ******************************************************* 『グランド・セフト・オートIII: 10周年記念エディション』に関する詳細は下記でご確認ください: http://www.rockstargames.com/newswire/tags#?tags=501 テクニカルサポート: http://support.rockstargames.com/forums/20575411-GTA-III-for-Android-iOS?locale=1 ポート開発: War Drum Studios http://www.wardrumstudios.com Welcome to Liberty City. It all started from here. The history of the most influential games of Rockstar Games will celebrate its 10th anniversary. Blockbuster title that has been acclaimed "Grand Theft Auto III" is, appeared to mobile devices. Reproduce the underground world of dubious dark of Liberty City in diverse and spectacular open world. Any type of character appears, in this freely explore possible game, you can experience in your hand the crime world of yet ruthless attractive darkness. Great voice acting, black humor of the story, a stunning soundtrack and revolutionary open-world gameplay can enjoy "Grand Theft Auto III" is, over one generation, we have to define the genre of open world game . Features: • visually stunning latest graphics, character and vehicle • High resolution • to optimize the game play for touch screen devices • custom operation for mobile platform • infinity of play time • corresponding to part of the USB game pad • Integration with haptic / vibration feedback function of Immersion • Customizable visual experience with the new display settings Languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese "Grand Theft Auto III" is available in the following equipment. • Android phone: Galaxy Nexus, HTC Rezound, LG Optimus 2x, Motorola Atrix 4G, Motorola Droid X2, Motorola Photon 4G, Samsung Galaxy R, Sony Ericsson Xperia Play, T-Mobile G2x • Android tablets: Acer Iconia, Asus Eee Pad Transformer, Asus Eee Pad Transformer Prime, Dell Streak 7, LG Optimus Pad, Medion Lifetab, Motorola Xoom, Samsung Galaxy Tab 8.9 and 10.1, Sony Tablet S, Toshiba Thrive For the best play: "Grand Theft Auto III 10 Year Anniversary Edition" the, restart the equipment after the download, it is recommended that it be terminated other applications. To: "Grand Theft Auto III 10 Year Anniversary Edition" installed, please have 1GB or more of free space. ************************************************** ***** For more information about: "Grand Theft Auto III 10 Year Anniversary Edition" please check the following: http://www.rockstargames.com/newswire/tags#?tags=501 Technical Support: http://support.rockstargames.com/forums/20575411-GTA-III-for-Android-iOS?locale=1 Port development: War Drum Studios http://www.wardrumstudios.com

description: Welcome back to Vice City. Welcome back to the 1980s. From the decade of big hair, excess and pastel suits comes a story of one man's rise to the top of the criminal pile. Vice City, a huge urban sprawl ranging from the beach to the swamps and the glitz to the ghetto, was one of the most varied, complete and alive digital cities ever created. Combining open-world gameplay with a character driven narrative, you arrive in a town brimming with delights and degradation and given the opportunity to take it over as you choose. To celebrate its 10 year anniversary, Rockstar Games brings Grand Theft Auto: Vice City to mobile devices with high-resolution graphics, updated controls and a host of new features including: • Beautifully updated graphics, character models and lighting effects • New, precisely tailored firing and targeting options • Custom controls with a fully customizable layout • Massive campaign with countless hours of gameplay • Compatible with the MoGa Wireless Game Controller and select USB gamepads • Integrated with Immersion tactile effects  • Tailor your visual experience with adjustable graphic settings Languages Supported: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Korean, Russian, and Japanese. Grand Theft Auto: Vice City is now available on: Android Phones: Motorola Atrix, Motorola Atrix HD, Motorola Atrix 4G, Motorola Photon, HTC Rezound, HTC One X, HTC One X+, Samsung Galaxy Nexus, Samsung Galaxy Note, Samsung Galaxy Note 2, Samsung Galaxy R, Samsung Epic 4G, Samsung Galaxy S2, Samsung Galaxy S3, Google Nexus 4, Sony Ericsson Arc HD, Sony Xperia Nozomi, Sony Xperia Play, Sony Xperia Sola, Sony Xperia S / P / T & TL, Sony Walkman Z Series Media Player Android Tablets: Acer Iconia, Asus Eee Pad Transformer Prime, Asus Transformer Pad TF300T, Asus Transformer Pad Infinity 700, Motorola Xoom, Samsung Galaxy Tab 7.0 / 7.7 / 8.9 & 10.1, Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1, Sony Tablet S, Sony Tablet P, Sony Xperia Tablet S, Toshiba Thrive, Toshiba Regza, Google Nexus 7, Google Nexus 10, Fujitsu Stylistic 10.1 **Grand Theft Auto: Vice City was developed and tested only on these devices. If your device is not listed, please check support.rockstargames.com for any updates to this list** For optimal performance, we recommend re-booting your device after downloading and closing other applications when playing Grand Theft Auto: Vice City. Please ensure you have at least 1.5 GB of free space before installing Grand Theft Auto: Vice City. app_name: Learn to Read and Spell Pro
description: "Learn to Read, Write and Spell" app is specially designed for tablet users and made for "Ages 5 and Above", it is a perfect INTERACTIVE LEARNING App for kids as it uses graphics and fun games as a medium to teach children to - - Recognize letters - Understand sound & keyword for each letter of the alphabet - Read by blending letters to form words - Write by tracing each letter - Spell by seeing and hearing sounds of each letter and blending them - Pronunciation with visual guides provided and hearing their sounds Learning English made easy and fun where every lesson is followed by interesting Games to test what you have learned. > Designed for childrens, adolescents or even adults, who have - Learning Disabilities - LD *Learning disabilities are neurologically-based processing problems. *These processing problems can interfere with learning basic skills such as reading, writing and/or math. - ADHD (Attention Deficit Hyperactive Disorder) - Dyslexia (disability that affects reading and related language-based processing skills) - Dyscalculia (specific learning disability that affects a person’s ability to understand numbers and learn math facts) - Dysgraphia (specific learning disability that affects a person’s handwriting ability and fine motor skills) - Language Processing Disorder (LPD) - Are reading below their expected level - Cannot Encode or Decode words > Key Features: - Interactive Games to test your skills - Progress Report for monitoring improvement - Divided into simple lessons(Letters Lesson, Reading Lesson, Writing Lessons, Spelling Skills, Language Skills, Dictionary Skills) The App first teaches all the letters of the alphabet, then proceeds to teach all the skills one needs to read on a sixth grade level. This multisensory reading, spelling and penmanship(writing) program builds an association between symbols and sounds in the English language through self-paced repetition. It utilizes the close association of visual, auditory and kinesthetic elements to help students improve their language skills. > This app is Recommended for: - Public/Private Schools (resource rooms, special education classes, ESL programs) - Libraries/Literacy Centers - Home schooling - Home computers - Correctional, Rehabilitation, Youth Detention Centers and Vocational Facilities - Community Colleges (LD Resource Centers) > Extensive practice in Reading, Spelling and Penmanship(Writing) throughout the usage of App. Students and Teachers can move to different lessons/modules in the app by utilizing the progress report. They can click on the "DOWN ARROW" after the short introduction. This will take them to a progress report. The names of the modules, in the app, are located on the left side of the screen (letter, reading, spelling, writing, language and dictionary lessons). When you select them, the voice will identify the name of the module. Next to each module are numbered buttons which correspond to the numbered lessons. One may select any numbered button and go right to the lesson of their choice. Teachers can decide if they wish to have a student follow the sequence, as it is presented in the app, or may decide to use the app to reinforce a particular reading skill which was just introduced in class. Visit our websites: http://www.rogerscenter.com/order-special-education-software-for-learning-disabilities.aspx http://www.rogerscenter.com/contact-us-special-education-programs-Dyslexia.aspx Follow us for updates and news: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Rogers-Center/481830485185863 Twitter: https://twitter.com/RogersCenter1

Rsupport provides remote support service to enterprises based on powerful and secured mobile cloud, and with this App, users can enjoy the service with latest technology and security. This App has been directly tested and certified by Pantech to be safely installed and it serves the following purposes. •Mobizen ( http://www.mobizen.com ) - Connect with Smartphone or Tablet from PC (supports USB, Wi-Fi, 3G/LTE) - Using Smartphone mirroring, use Android App on PC (Using Instagram with Mobizen video: http://youtu.be/CphMcAWGLa8 ) - Record mobile screen: record the screen or take screenshot without rooting or special setup. - Mobile contents streaming: access the music and video stored in the Smartphone without transferring them. - File transfer with Drag & Drop: easily send and receive files between PC and mobile by mouse’s drag & drop. - Smartwork support: make presentation of information on the Smartphone with mirroring, check text messages, email, SNS notification and missed calls using notification feature. ​​ • RemoteCall + mobile pack ( http://www.rsupport.com/kr ​/products/remotecall/mobilepack) - Screen sharing: connect with technical support representative, share the mobile screen to analyze the problem and provide a quicker and more professional solution. - Remote control: launch programs and allow the representative to control the mobile device to directly analyze and solve the problem. - Every possible communication method in remote support: user can write or draw directly on the phone, 2-way text chat and talk while you are on the call. description: Tired of putting out your phone, unlock it and swipe down the notification bar every time a notification arrives? Get the Watchify Smart Extension! Watchify allows you to send all your notifications to your SmartWatch2. The application can be used for 15 days without any limitations. After the trial period you can buy a license via an in-app purchase whereby you decide how much this extension is worth! Features: - Application filtering: Select the applications you want to be notified from. - Have the same amount of information on the watch as in the notification bar (including images) - Always in synch: Only notifications in your notifications bar are visible on the phone - delete the notification on the phone and it will be immediately removed from your SmartWatch2 and vice versa. - Deletion: Remove the notifications from your SmartWatch2 - Notification behaviour: Change the way you want to be notified when the phone is awake or in night mode - Support for unicode characters (smilies, arabic alphabet, hebrew alphabet etc.) Coming soon: - Application specific notification styles - Sticky notifications filtering Smart extension for SmartWatch 2 notification Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2 notification
release_text: v2.1.0 - Added fallback notification parser for non-standard notifications - Showing the whole list of available applications to allow system notifications to be pushed to the watch (enable Phone application to see missed calls) v2.0.1 - Leaving the BETA state! - Complete new parser for the notifications therefore: - Extended notification support for all applications - Support for "Big Image" notifications - Same icons in the widget as in the notification bar on the phone -Bugfixes

Try before the free version to check if it is possible to recover your pics, if you cannot recover any picture with the free version you will not recover any picture with this app. Ads free version, you can recover every picture. Recover your deleted pictures from you device. This application transforms the thumbnails saved in your device as TEC files back to JPG files. Useful for every device that saves the thumbnails in a cache folder of the system, like the Samsung Galaxy family. Instructions: -In the first screen choose to search manually or launch automatic search -If you choose manual search,in the second screen you can browse the file system. Search for the folder( typically /sdcard/DCIM/Camera/cache) were you have your .tec files. When you have opened the folder and see the files, press the select button -If you choose automatic search , wait until the dialog displays where your tec files are stored, and press ok if you want to recover the pictures. -In the next screen , press start to recover all the pictures -you will see a list of the pictures recovered , you can watch them in the gallery app.

description: With the SAP Business ByDesign mobile app for Android, you can access the on-demand solution for small businesses and midsize companies through an intuitive user interface specifically designed for business on the go. This app allows sales colleagues and managers to handle accounts, contacts, and activities right from their Android-based smartphone. Key features of SAP Business ByDesign for Android: • Manage your data, including accounts, contacts, and activities • Administer approvals • Monitor, review, and explore reports Note: To use the SAP Business ByDesign mobile app for Android with your business data, you must be a user of the SAP Business ByDesign solution with Feature Pack 3.5 or higher and with mobile services enabled by your IT department.

With the SAP Cloud for Travel and Expense mobile app for Android, you can manage your travel and expenses anywhere and anytime. This app brings the power of the SAP Cloud for Travel and Expense solution to your Android device, enabling business travelers to quickly and easily capture new expenses in real time. Key features of SAP Cloud for Travel and Expense for Android: • Create new expense reports • Add new expenses, add attendees, claim mileage, and itemize expenses while on the road • Use image recognition to add an expense, or add an expense manually and attach a photo of the receipt • Add and change expenses when you're offline • Select type of assignment to expense reports: automatic, manual, or no assignment Note: To use this app, you must be a user of the SAP Cloud for Travel and Expense solution, with mobile services enabled by your IT department.
release_text: • Support for adding multiple attachments to expenses • Support for including non-travel-related expenses • Functionality for viewing and editing expenses on a mobile device regardless of where they were created

description: Bill Reminder is the simplest bill tracker around! You always need a simple tool to control how much you want to spend this month. Essentially you need lists with bills, and a calendar where you can see your overdue payments, planned payments, and check what has already been paid off. Now you don't have to worry about forgetting to pay your bills while you go about your busy schedule! It is the Pro edition of Bill Reminder Free Main Features: - Add,Edit and Delete Bills - Calendar / List View of Bills - Recurrent Bills : Weekly, 2 Weeks, 3 Weeks, 4 Weeks, 5 Weeks, 6 Weeks, 7 Weeks, 8 Weeks, Monthly, 2 Months, 3 Months, 6 Months, Yearly - See Over due,Today and upcoming bills when the app starts up - Select number of days in upcoming bills - Identify the state of bills by individual marker on dates - Widget showing no. of Overdue, Today,Next 7 days Bills - Statistics : Pie Chart, Bar Chart - Use the built-in calculator to quickly calculate bill amounts - Add bills with categories, amount, notes - Reminder about today bills - Different Calendar Styles - Date formats - Different Color for payable and receivables - Templates - Categories - Share Bill - Shows this month total paid amount,unpaid amount - Search Bill by Name - Supports Local Decimal Separator like dot in US, comma in French - Simple and Easy to use - Filter by Payable, Receivable - Export - Backup and Restore to/from SD Card. - Widget - Multiple currency support - Order List by Name/Status/Type/Priority - Hide paid bills - Help Permissions : - Write to SD card permission to export payments - Vibrate to remind payment Please do not move the application to the sd card if you want to use the widgets (general limitation of the Android operating system)! Due to Android market policy, you will have only 15-minutes refund window. Please check with Demo version before purchase. Please feel free to contact " sappfusion@gmail.com " if you have any questions, comments or recommendations. Unfortunately Google Play does allow to respond to the comments here, so please contact the developer directly. Thanks for your support!!

description: An electric locomotive is a locomotive powered by electricity from overhead lines, a third rail or an on-board energy storage device (such as a chemical battery or fuel cell). Electrically propelled locomotives with on-board fuelled prime movers, such as diesel engines or gas turbines, are classed as diesel-electric or gas turbine-electric locomotives because the electric generator/motor combination only serves as a power transmission system. Electricity is used to eliminate smoke and take advantage of the high efficiency of electric motors; however, the cost of railway electrification means that usually only heavily used lines can be electrified.

description: The new Talking Timer for Android. The only timer that talks! Talking Timer is a Simple, Clean, Easy to use and accurate. The only timer in the market that TALKS & gives you alert intervals! Why wait until the timer if finished if you can get alerts every minute? Ideal for: * Cooks & Chefs * Computer Monitoring * Babysitters * Daycare Providers * School Teachers * Professional Gamers * RC Pilots * Timing Medications * Hospitals & Clinics * Physical Therapists * Office Workers * Paintball Timers for hardcore paintball players * Timing Exercise Routines * Darkroom Photography * Debate Teams * Outdoor Barbecues Imagine this - You're cooking pasta. You need to mix it up every 5 minutes and the whole process takes 30 minutes. Would you set a timer for 5 minutes every single time? NO! Set the timer once to 30 minutes, set the interval for 5 minutes and VIOLA! La clé qui ouvre de nouvelles portes La TROUSSE express SCHL pour les conseillers en prêts hypothécaires offre au conseiller en prêts hypothécaires particulièrement occupé d'aujourd'hui accès aux outils et à l'information dont il a besoin, et ce, de manière rapide et commode. Elle vous permet notamment : - de trouver et de comparer entre eux des produits d'assurance prêt hypothécaire; - de rester au fait des dernières nouvelles et annonces de la SCHL; - d'avoir accès à des calculateurs et autres outils novateurs; - d'avoir accès, dans la RESSOURCE, à votre bibliothèque de feuillets documentaires* personnalisés et génériques et de pouvoir instantanément les partager avec d'autres à partir de votre appareil mobile; - d'aider vos clients à prendre des décisions éclairées en leur faisant découvrir une série de guides de la SCHL sur l'habitation; - de communiquer avec la SCHL, rapidement et sur simple pression d'une touche, pour obtenir les réponses dont vous avez besoin, au moment où vous en avez besoin. Depuis plus de 65 ans, la Société canadienne d'hypothèques et de logement, l'organisme national responsable de l'habitation au Canada, partage ses vastes connaissances, son expertise, ses outils et ses conseils en habitation afin d'aider les conseillers en prêts hypothécaires à demeurer informés et à devenir des conseillers de confiance pour leurs clients. * Pour avoir accès à la RESSOURCE au moyen de la TROUSSE express SCHL, il faut préalablement s'enregistrer. Consultez www.schl.ca/laressource pour plus de détails. The key that opens new doors Express KIT CMHC for mortgage advisers offers advisor today particularly busy access to tools mortgages and information they need, and in a quick and convenient way. It allows you to: - Find and compare them to mortgage insurance products; - Keep up with the latest news and announcements from CMHC; - Have access to computers and other innovative tools; - To have access to the RESOURCE, your library of custom and generic solution sheets * and can instantly share them with other from your mobile device; - To help clients make informed decisions by showing them a series of guides on CMHC housing; - Communicate with CMHC, quickly and at the push of a button to get the answers that you need, when you need it. For over 65 years, the Canadian Mortgage and Housing Corporation, the national body responsible for housing in Canada, sharing his vast knowledge, expertise, tools and advice to help housing counselors mortgages to stay informed and become trusted advisors to their clients. * To access the RESOURCE through express KIT CMHC, you must first register. Check www.schl.ca / laressource for more details.
release_text: Le contenu de la TROUSSE express SCHL pour les conseillers en prêts hypothécaires a été mis à jour en fonction des nouvelles limites maximales pour le prix des maisons, la période d'amortissement et les rapports d'amortissement de la dette entré en vigueur le 31 juillet 2014. La clé qui ouvre de nouvelles portes

description: Alien Anagrams is a game designed to help and encourage kids and adults to improve their vocabulary and word skills. By making it fun, they will become better at it without even realising, and have fun along the way! The game is very simple to play. The aim is to get to the end of each level; you automatically fly forwards, and can shoot at the alien ships by correctly entering the word given in the anagram. You can pick up extra weapons and choose which one to shoot, but the better the weapon, the longer the word! If you get to the end of the level, you will go onto the next, which has longer words and more aliens. If any aliens manage to reach you, it's game over! This game is designed for age ranges of approximately 8 years old to adults. It has one single in-app purchase, which unlocks the full game and allows access to all levels and all weapons. This game has no adverts! If you have any problems, queries or suggestions, please email me at stephen@penultimateapps.com . I promise to reply to all emails. Twitter: https://twitter.com/stephencsmith

Block Blaster is a game of skill where the aim is to knock out all the blocks with the limited number of shots. Other types of block may help or hinder you. Get the angles right to proceed to the next level. Twitter: https://twitter.com/stephencsmith

Designed to be easy to use, this Podcast Manager is ideal for listening to Podcasts from your phone:- * Scans your SD Card for all mp3s. * Voice search. * Reads and displays the details of your podcasts (artist, album, etc...) * Remembers previously played podcasts and the last position, so you can pick up exactly where you left off. * Delete listened-to podcasts. * Easily browse your phone's memory for podcasts. * Easy to use interface for skipping through podcasts. If you have any problems, queries or suggestions, please email me at stephen@penultimateapps.com . I promise to reply to all emails.

Intelligent Traffic Alerts takes driving alerts and notifications to the next level. No longer do you need to search for road incidents or read pages of traffic information. Simply set this app running just before you driving, and it will tell you about all incidents near to your current position. There is no danger when driving as there's nothing to look at; just listen out for nearby incidents. This app is very simple to use: just ensure the GPS on your phone is active, and then simply listen as you drive. Features:- * Very simple to use - no need to search maps or lists of roads. * Automatically and immediately receive alerts close to your location. * It has descriptions of all incidents as well as distance and the direction from your current location. * Live and up-to-date traffic data is taken directly from the UK Highways agency. * The safe way to receive alerts - no need to take your eyes off the road. * Covers all major roads including motorways and A-roads. This app has no adverts or in-app purchases - you get all features immediately. If you like this app, please leave a rating! If you have any problems, queries or suggestions, please email me at stephen@penultimateapps.com . I promise to reply to all emails. All my apps come with no-quibble money back guarantee: if you're not happy, I will refund. Download: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.scs.trafficalertsiq.main.full Twitter: https://twitter.com/stephencsmith

description: Want to impress your friends with your prowess in the Alchemy game? Stuck and need help? Or just looking to figure out a few of the more difficult combinations without paying $5 to get the hints? Well, this app will allow you to see ALL of the combinations and their elemental products in the popular game Alchemy for only $1! Not only does this save you $4, but it gives you access to ALL of the elements, not just select hints! And, this will be updated when new versions of the game come out with new elements, so you'll never be left behind!
release_text: Updated to all 380 elemental combinations! Sorry for the delay folks, been busy for a while. Improved organization of the list to an alphebetical order, much better now!

description: Whip - is a comic program for playing whip sound by phone shaking (fighting). Cheer your friends and teachers!

*** GetMe2 Perth has reached the end of its life, please see the new and fully featured GetMe2 Transit. Full trip planner, timetables stored on your device, easier to use and real time transit in selected locations! *** -Ad free version without favourite route/trip limitations- GetMe2 Perth is designed to get you from where you are to where you want to go, all using the public transport system available to you! Bus, Ferry and Train times are stored on your phone so once you're up and running no Internet connection is required to access times. Some features include: - Stop selection via map (no need to know your stop number) - Point to point allowing selection of a departure and arrival point, the rest of the work will be done for you! - Ability to find stops near your location and display the routes of all services departing these stops - Stop times displayed on the map for each stop - Set an alarm before your service departs/arrives/transfers - Support for service transfers. This means all trip times are displayed, unlike other transport apps that sometimes miss over half of the services available - Journey planner with customisable transfer time links multiple services so you can make your connections - Show alternate services between selected stops - Street address for every stop listed - Favourite routes with customisable names - Include nearby stops with customisable search radius. i.e. include all stops within 100 metres of the selected stops for your trip - Filter services by transport type (bus/ferry/train) and/or service name - Direction switcher to view services in the opposite direction - Stop filter so stops in the opposite direction aren't displayed - Select how many days in advance to show service times for, or increase search day by day - Show all services frequenting a stop by selecting the stop from the map - Easy to navigate screen flow - Automatically checks for timetable updates - Gesture support for moving between tabs Compatible with tablets although not officially supported at this stage. Enjoy!
release_text: v1.201 -New Feature: Set an alarm for a departing/arriving service or a transfer between services -Bug Fix: Timetable updater sometimes crashed when checking for a timetable update if no Internet connection was available, download progress bar incorrectly reported progress -Bug Fix: Further minor bug fixes causing various crashes -Improvement: Even smaller timetable -Improvement: Notification to update timetable when it's out of date. Defaulted auto update check to every three days

삼성 모아키 키보드 스킨 (삼성단말용) (본 어플리케이션은 삼성 Galaxy A,S(I,II),K,U,Nexus,Note 등 삼성 단말 전용입니다.) 모아키는 터치스크린 기반 단말에서 한글 입력을 가장 쉽고 빠르게 입력 할 수 있도록 제공하는 키보드 프로그램입니다. 자음을 누른 후 간단한 제스쳐 만으로 한글의 자음과 모음을 한 번에 입력 할 수 있습니다. 보다 빠르고 정확하게 입력할 수 있는 모아키를 지금 경험해 보세요. (* 버전 1.0.111117부터는 긋기로 모든 모음을 커버 할 수 있게 됨에 따라, 기본모드가 긋기 모드로 변경되었습니다. 기존 팝업모드를 사용하고 싶은 경우 설정에서 활성화 하시거나 Space키를 길러 눌러 사용 하실 수 있습니다.) "천지인 만큼 쉽지는 않습니다. 하지만 속도와 편안함이 달라집니다. 지금 분당 100자(300타)에 도전해 보세요!" ■ 모아키 스킨 설정 방법 처음 설치하시는 경우, 다운 및 설치 완료 후 "열기"를 누르시면 새로운 스킨으로 적용된 모아키 키보드를 사용하실 수 있습니다. ■ Since 2006 모아키 모아키는 2006년부터 터치스크린 기반 단말에서의 빠르고 편리한 입력을 위해 다양한 접근을 시도 및 개선하고 있습니다. ■ 모아키와 소통 모아키는 전용 twitter나 facebook을 통해 주요 업데이트 공지 및 사용자 소통 창구로 활용하고자 합니다. - Twitter : http://mobile.twitter.com/secmoakey - Facebook : http://www.facebook.com/secmoakey ---- 개발자 연락처 : 02-2255-0114 Samsung moahki keyboard skins (for Samsung UE) (In this application, the Samsung Galaxy A, S (I, II), K, U, Nexus, Note, Samsung UE-only, etc.) Moahki Hangul input from the touch screen to the base station so that you can quickly and easily provide a keyboard program. Consonants, and then only with a simple gesture of consonants and vowels of Hangul, you can enter at a time. You can type faster and more accurately in moahki Experience now. (* Starting with version 1.0.111117 flick to be able to cover all the vowels as the default mode has been changed to flick mode. Existing pop-up mode is used if you want to bring up settings, press the Space key to activate or use. ) "Tenchijin not as easy as it is, but depending on the speed and comfort now to 100 characters per minute (300 L) to challenge me!" ■ How to set the skin moahki If you are a first-time installation, complete the download and installation of the "open" a new skin applied to the press, you can use the keyboard to moahki. ■ Since 2006 moahki Moahki in 2006 based on a touch screen input terminal for the fast and convenient access to a variety of options to try and improve. ■ moahki and communication Through a dedicated twitter or facebook moahki major update notifications and want to utilize your communication window. - Twitter: http://mobile.twitter.com/secmoakey - Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/secmoakey

GOLF TIPS, GOLF LESSONS AND GOLF INSTRUCTION WITH PGA TOUR PRO KEVIN STREELMAN "GOLF LIKE A TOUR PRO WITH KEVIN STREELMAN" FEATURED ON: Golf Channel Sports Illustrated - What's Hot USA Today.com Golf Week NBC-TV Phoenix TechNews Arizona DID YOU KNOW THAT 90% OF POOR SHOTS BY AMATEURS ARE THE RESULT OF BAD SET-UPS, NOT POOR SWINGS? GOLF LIKE A TOUR PRO was created to help golfers of all handicaps score better on the course with concise golf instruction and a golf lesson that will reduce strokes with a more accurate golf swing KEVIN STREELMAN, a top 30 ranked Professional on the PGA Tour and ranked in the top 70 in the World, will show you how to hit 50 different shots. These are the kind of tips that golfer of all levels can use. He will cover everything from the tee shot to the green. How to do it is what this APP is all about. The difference between the Tour Pro and the everyday golfer is not just the money or the execution, but KNOWING WHAT TO DO WITH THE SHOT. How to align your feet? Where to aim? Where the ball should be set up? Even the correct club to use. Kevin analyzes each situation and gives you the proper set-up in summary form as well as the strategic adjustments needed to make that good shot. You will see how the laws of physics combined with proper mechanics will make you a better golfer. You will also get a Pro Tip from Kevin for each shot. Kevin will even show you and talk you through what the set-up should look like with our enhanced video feature. You can even see Kevin hit the shot in slow motion. But best of all, you can take your Smartphone on the course and quickly look up what you should do in seconds with just a couple of touches. No more trying to remember what a book or video told you to do. You can even sit in the airport or on the plane and review from your Smartphone. Its cost is less then a sleeve of balls!!! Visit us at HYPERLINK " http://www.ssquaredgolf.com " www.ssquaredgolf.com Features: Shot selection from 9 different locations on a hole: 50 shot set-ups from different lies: Analysis of each situation and what adjustments and why you need to make them to hit the best shot A special tip from Kevin that emphasizes the key elements that the Pro’s always think about when preparing a shot A video that shows the proper set-up for all the shots with audio explaining exactly how to do it A separate slow motion video that shows Kevin executing the shot The ability to pause throughout both videos to study the shot techniques An easy review of all summaries, lies, and strategies with just a slide of the screen Ability to create a favorites folder for those frequent shots on the course and at the driving range
release_text: Corrections made to run fast and efficiently on Droid and all smartphones.
