With the SAP Business One mobile app for Android, you can access SAP Business One, SAP’s enterprise resource planning application for small businesses, anywhere, anytime. The mobile app lets managers, executives, sales reps, and service techs stay informed about their business, view reports, manage contacts, and handle sales and service activities. Key features of SAP Business One for Android • Get alerts on events, like deviations of approved prices, credit limits, or targeted gross profits • Visualize key information about your business in real time with reports and interactive dashboards • Create, edit, or view sales opportunities, quotations, and orders, and handle service call activities • Manage contacts and activities; all info is synched with SAP Business One and the on-device calendar • Monitor inventory levels and get product details, including purchasing and sales prices and photos Note: To use the SAP Business One mobile app with your own business data, you must be running the SAP Business One application as your back-end system. You can try out the mobile app now using a demo logon.
release_text: • Support for downloading/uploading attachments to business partners, sales documents, activities, and service calls • Function for copying contacts from business partners to device address book and vice versa • Display of delivery documents • Enforcement of valid SSL certificates (SAP Notes reference 2019275) • Option for providing feedback about the app • Improvements for sales documents, sales catalog, activities, and business partners

description: Power On Volume (Button Fix) is an app designed for phones and tablets with faulty or broken power buttons. If your tablet or phone’s power button is starting to fail, stop using it and get this app! POWER ON USING VOLUME KEYS Using Power On Volume you can wake up your tablet or phone and power on your screen using the physical volume keys on your tablet or phone instead of using a faulty power button. *** NOW USES MUCH LESS BATTERY POWER *** Tests showed up to 72% reduction in battery drain compared to previous versions. Battery drain varies by device type and can still be an issue on some devices. POWER OFF OPTIONS Using Power On Volume you can power off the screen, lock the screen, and enter power saving sleep mode using three options: * Waving your hand in front of your device’s proximity sensor (if supported). * Long pressing the search button (on devices with a search key). * Pressing a Power Off shortcut icon from your home screen. * Pressing the Power Off button in the Power On Volume app. * Pressing a Power Off notification in the notification bar. The long press search button feature is fully configurable. You can enable and disable this feature, and you can also select other apps to be launched when you long press the search button if they support this feature (such as the Google Voice Search app). The Power Off shortcut icon can be selected from 16 beautiful HD Power Off icons. The Power Off feature is compatible with all current versions of Android. Unlike many other apps available, the Power Off function will never turn the screen back on unpredictably like other similar apps are known to do when run on Android OS versions 4.0.4 or 4.1.1. When the Power Off Proximity function is enabled (on supported hardware), you can turn off your device by waving your hand in front of the proximity sensor or by placing your device face down, putting it in a pocket, etc. Any action that covers the front will turn off your device. The Power Off Proximity function won’t turn off your phone during calls or when the phone is ringing. The Power Off Proximity function doesn’t consume any power when disabled or when the screen is off, saving precious battery life. ROOT FEATURES The root features require a rooted tablet or phone. If you don’t know was root is, you probably don’t have a rooted tablet or phone. * Hot Boot: restarts the android GUI (if supported by your rooted system). * Power Long Press: emulates long pressing the hardware power button. * Reboot: reboots the device (if supported by your rooted system). * Reboot Recovery: reboots the device into recovery mode (if supported by your rooted system). * Shutdown: completely powers down your device The Hot Boot, Reboot, and Reboot Recovery features rely on busybox and therefore work on most but not all rooted systems. Support for these features depends on the version of busybox installed, and how your rooted system is configured. WHAT THIS APP DOES NOT DO * This app cannot power on your tablet or phone’s screen if it’s not in sleep mode. If it is completely shut down, it is impossible for apps to run. Because this is an app, your tablet or phone must be in sleep mode for it to be able to power on the screen. * This app cannot reboot a tablet or phone that is not rooted. * This app cannot completely power off a tablet or phone that is not rooted. *** TABLET/PHONE COMPATIBILITY *** This app version was tested on ICS, Gingerbread, Honeycomb and Jellybean Android OS versions using select Samsung, Arnova, and Craig phones, tablets, and netbooks and runs well. Some phones/tablets might not work properly with this app. If you experience any problems please contact me for support. ***UNINSTALLING*** Use the app's built-in "Uninstall" button for an easy uninstall. Uninstalling by other methods can fail. ***REFUNDS*** If you contact me for support and I cannot get the app to work on your tablet or phone after a few attempts I will give you a full refund when requested.
release_text: v1.0.0.15 * Improved the responsiveness of the Power Off Long Press root function for certain rooted devices. v1.0.0.14 * Made the Power Off Long Press root function support more rooted devices. v1.0.0.13 * Fixed the Power Off Long Press’s description expand button not expanding the description. v1.0.0.12 * Fixed a rare startup crash issue.

developer: Media Applications Technologies for the BBC
description: Features include: - Watch live TV - Catch up on the past 30 days - Watch on Wi-Fi and cellular networks - Download TV programmes to watch later (on devices running Android OS Ice Cream Sandwich and above) - Browse Categories and Channels - Cast content to your TV using Chromecast - Share your Favourites across other devices with a BBC iD account ** We’ve developed the BBC Media Player app to improve video streaming playback on Android devices. You’ll need to install this separately from the Google Play Store. To make installation of the BBC Media Player as easy as possible, BBC iPlayer will prompt you to install it when you first play a streamed programme. The BBC iPlayer app uses standard Android app permissions that are defined by the Google Android platform. The permissions the BBC iPlayer Android app asks to use are: Photos/Media/Files "Read the contents of your USB storage" & "Modify or delete the contents of your USB storage" This permission is used to store downloaded programmes. The application must be able to write, read and delete these files. Device ID & Call Information "Read phone status and identity" This permission is used to read the Android "Device ID". This is an anonymous ID that cannot be used to identify the user and is not used to track the user. It is used by iPlayer's content protection system to ensure that downloaded programmes can only be played on the device that downloaded them. iPlayer does not use this permission to determine the device phone number, whether a call is active, or the remote number in a connected call. Other permissions (not explicitly mentioned when installing BBC iPlayer, as they are more general to most apps): "Prevent phone from sleeping" This permission is used by two features: Downloads & Chromecast. While downloading a programme, the application prevents the system from sleeping when the device is locked, so the download can continue. This is only active while a download is in progress. While "casting" a programme to a compatible receiver like Google's Chromecast, the application stops the system from fully sleeping when the phone is locked. This stops the application losing connection with the receiver so the phone can continue to control playback. "Full network access" iPlayer needs access to the internet to download programmes, schedules and information about programmes and configuration, and to send usage statistics. "View network connections" This permission lets iPlayer determine whether a network connection is available before accessing the network, and provide better error messages when it can’t retrieve data. iPlayer also determines what type of network connection is in use (Wi-Fi or Cellular) for the Downloads feature. Downloads are enabled when connected to a Wi-Fi network. On a cellular network, downloads are disabled/paused. "Test access to protected storage" This allows the app to check if there is space on your device to download programmes. To give you with the best experience, certain details like your Search History and Favourites may be stored on your device or securely on BBC servers. To analyse and improve the app, it also uses technologies similar to performance cookies used by the BBC. You can alter your settings for this on your device. For more information about this and privacy, cookies and iPlayer more generally, visit the BBC iPlayer privacy FAQ page at http://iplayerhelp.external.bbc.co.uk/tv/app_privacy , or the BBC’s Privacy & Cookies site at http://www.bbc.co.uk/privacy/ The app was developed by Media AT (Media Applications Technologies Limited) which is a wholly owned subsidiary of the BBC (British Broadcasting Corporation). Full details of Media AT are available on the Companies House website at: http://data.companieshouse.gov.uk/doc/company/07100235 .

description: TALKING and LISTENING BIBLE This software enables you to let your Android Smartphone or Tablet read Bible verses, chapters and books aloud. By speaking to your Android device you can also instruct the app which parts of the Bible to read aloud! Just press the microphone button and say what you are looking for. Bible Talk is also suitable for blind and visually impaired users. You can choose from no less than 5 different Bible versions: - King James Version, 1611. - American Standard Version, 1901. - Good News Bible, 1992. - Contemporary English Version, 1999. - World English Bible. It is also possible to find a passage in the Bible by typing its title. The format to find something in the Bible is as follows: - Book Name, Chapter number, Verse number, or - Book Name, Chapter number, Verse number to Verse number" (range of verses) Examples: - "Genesis". - "Lucas four". - "James Chapter Two". - "Mark Verse three". - "Exodus Chapter Four Verse three". - "Acts six verse one to six." - "Ecclesiastes Chapter Five Verse three to seven." The "Talking Bible" software provides five modes: 1. Bible Search and Read mode. 2. Bible index Old and New Testament. 3. Bible version selection. 4. Preference Settings. 5. Read the User Guide. Regular control by using the Menu in stead of using speech recognition is also possible. An extra feature is that you can ask Bible Talk some simple questions like: - "What is the [third] commandment". - "Who is the Pope". This feature will be expanded in future versions (free of charge to Talking Bible buyers). We hope you will enjoy the use of this software! DSH electronics Leidschendam The Netherlands www.dsh2000.com info@dsh2000.com .

Stopwatch One, a timekeeping app, offers an advanced stopwatch. Whether you're a single athlete wanting to time yourself, or you're in charge of a participant, this versatile app is up to the challenge. The full-featured app SportsTimer pro is also available in the Market. Record all your laps and stay informed about each lap performance. This stopwatch can be controlled in all situations--even while you're moving--because it offers optional tactile feedback and additional control through the volume buttons. At the end of the action, you can check all your lap times, save the result in a time history or send the complete result to your friends. Optional you can export the data to your device's SD card. Your time history is saved in a file format that can be even opened and edited in Excel. FEATURE LIST: - display can contains the total and lap time - recording of laps & elapsed times - shows delta to best lap time - Tactile feedback - Control stopwatches by volume buttons - Different layouts for landscape and portrait mode - Saving up to 10 result in timing history. Options Sharing options -Save results to SD-card in csv-format -Sharing results via email, sms, twitter etc Interface options - Setup orientation mode - Setup wake lock mode

Disponível para smartphones Android, o aplicativo tem os principais jogos do Brasileirão, Estaduais, Copa do Brasil, Libertadores, Espanhol, Inglês, Francês e os mais disputados campeonatos do mundo. Você poderá favoritar até seis times para receber informações personalizadas, como calendário de jogos, notícias, fotos e vídeos, além de notificações de início, gols marcados e término de partida. O lance a lance ainda permite que você avalie os jogadores das duas equipes e o árbitro da partida. Para quem prefere acompanhar o Placar UOL enquanto assiste aos jogos pela televisão, o aplicativo tem a opção “Vendo pela TV”, que habilita uma versão do placar editada, com as opiniões dos especialistas, comentários das redes sociais, avaliação dos atletas, além dos principais lances do jogo marcados em uma linha do tempo. Desenvolvido para proporcionar uma navegação rápida e confortável, as informações contidas no aplicativo são atualizadas automaticamente. O UOL, maior empresa brasileira de conteúdo e serviços de internet, oferece todos estes recursos gratuitamente. App Score UOL is more complete and a new look.   The new Score brings UOL now much more information, opinion bloggers and interactivity. Available for Android smartphones, the application has the key of the Brasileirão games, State, Brazil Cup, Copa Libertadores, Spanish, English, French and the most played in the world championships. You can favoritar up to six times to get personalized information such as games calendar, news, photos and videos, as well as early notification, goals scored and starting end. The move after move also allows you to evaluate the players from both teams and the referee of the match. For those who prefer track Score UOL while watching the games on television, the application has the "Buy on TV", which enables a version of the edited score, with the opinions of experts, reviews of social networks, evaluation of athletes, in addition to main game throws scored in a timeline.   Designed to provide a quick and comfortable navigation, the information contained in the application are automatically updated. The UOL, Brazil's largest content and internet services, offers all of these features for free.

A TIM trabalha para você falar mais, fazer mais e ir mais longe. Por isso, o aplicativo Portas Abertas foi criado para você acompanhar de perto as melhorias que estão sendo feitas. Em poucos cliques, você pode colaborar registrando o que acontece em sua região. Você também pode consultar o mapa de cobertura de onde estiver. • Visualize a cobertura TIM 2G, 3G e 4G, além da localização das antenas atuais e planejadas. • Receba alertas de rede: fique informado sobre otimizações programadas e incidentes em andamento perto de você. • Colabore com a melhora do serviço na sua região: informe, de forma simples e rápida, qualquer problema na ligação ou na conexão de internet e ajude a melhorar os serviços da TIM. Através de seus reportes, vamos trabalhar para aprimorar nossos serviços cada vez mais. Qualidade, transparência e inovação. Saiba mais em: http://tim.com.br/portasabertas Se você precisar de um atendimento específico para seu caso, entre em contato através dos nossos canais de atendimento: http://www.tim.com.br/para-voce/atendimento . TIM works for you talk more, do more and go further. Therefore, the Compass app was created for you to closely monitor the improvements that are being made. In a few clicks, you can collaborate recording what happens in your area. You can also check the coverage map of where you are.   • Visualize coverage TIM 2G, 3G and 4G, plus the location of current and planned antennas. • Receive alerts network: stay informed about planned enhancements and ongoing incidents near you.   • Collaborate with the improvement of the service in your region: report, simply and quickly, any connection problem or internet connection and help improve services TIM. Through their reports, we will work to improve our services even more.     Quality, transparency and innovation. Learn more at: http://tim.com.br/portasabertas   If you need a specific service for your event, please contact through our service channels: http://www.tim.com.br/para-voce/atendimento .

The Bad Bear stole the hive where our superhero Bee Avenger lived with his friends. Flying will not be fast enough to recover his house, he'll need to face various adventures, overcoming many obstacles and chasing the bear for several worlds. FACEBOOK: http://www.facebook.com/BeeAvenger This fun game has very addictive gameplay that uses the accelerometer control, you'll be challenged to ride the Bee Avenger dodging obstacles and picking up items to complete each level. The game animations follows a fun theme like Angry Birds and an addictive gameplay based on Motion Control(Accelerometer) like Trial Xtreme. ********* GAME FEATURES ********* * Addictive gameplay * Motion control (Accelerometer) * Very challenging (can you get 3 stars?) * Cool graphics * Forest world with 23 levels * Next worlds: Desert, Cavern and Snowfall * Best game credits ever Follow the Bee Avenger: http://twitter.com/beeavengergame # Powered by Ethanon Engine www.ethanon.com.br #

Gerenciador financeiro para controle de despesas pessoais de forma simples e rápida, tendo num único local o controle de seu dinheiro, saldo em contas bancárias e controle da fatura do cartão de crédito, mantendo facilmente o controle de sua finança mensal. Com o Finanças Total você pode possui: ► Agilidade no lançamento de despesas no dia a dia. ► Possibilidade de controle da fatura de cartão de crédito. ► Categorização das despesas. ► Proteção de acesso a suas informações com senha caso necessário. ► Controle do ganho e despesa mensal. ► Possibilidade de exportar suas movimentações para Excel. ► Controle de previsões de pagamentos e recebimentos. ► Controle automatizado de lançamentos fixos (Água, luz, telefone, salário, entre outros). ► Gráficos para analise de gastos/recebimentos. ► Backup/Restore de dados. O aplicativo é totalmente gratuito durante os 45 primeiros dias, após este período continuará gratuito para quem controlar até R$ 1.400 de débitos mensais (Sem restrições para créditos). Ultrapassando este limite você ficará impossibilitado de efetuar novos lançamentos no mês em questão, ao iniciar um novo mês você poderá voltar a lançar seus débitos gratuitamente até atingir o limite. Para liberar o sistema e utiliza-lo sem limites você deve ir na opção "Loja" e adquirir a assinatura anual por apenas R$ 9,99 (Valor único por ano de utilização). A cobrança deste valor é controlada automaticamente pelo Google e a cada período de tempo de um ano será realizada a cobrança da licença. Para cancelar a assinatura você deve ir na opção "Minhas assinaturas" do Google Play que aparecerá na página do aplicativo depois de adquirida a licença e cancelar a cobrança da mesma, você continuará tendo acesso a versão completa do sistema até o final do período adquirido, ao final você voltará a ser um usuário gratuito e não será mais realizada nenhuma cobrança. e-mail para contato: nsp.financastotal@gmail.com Perfil facebook: http://goo.gl/CjOJlb Perfil google+: http://goo.gl/fTyppr Financial manager to control personal expenses quickly and easily, and in one place control of your money balance in bank accounts and control of the credit card bill, easily keeping track of your monthly finance.     With the Total Finance you can have: ► Agility in start-up costs on a daily basis. ► Possibility to control the credit card bill. ► Categorization costs. ► Access Protection to your information with password if needed. ► Gain Control and monthly expense. ► Possibility to export your drives for Excel. ► Control of payment forecasts and receipts. ► Automated control of fixed releases (water, electricity, telephone, salary, etc.). ► charts for analysis of expenditure / receipts. ► Backup / Restore data.     The application is completely free for the first 45 days, after this period will remain free for the control up to £ 1,400 monthly debts (No restrictions for credits). Exceeding this limit you will be unable to make new releases in the month in question, to start a new month you can re-launch their debts free up to the limit. To release the system and use it without limits you should go on the "Store" and purchase the annual subscription for only $ 9.99 (single value per year of use). description: Convert Degrees Celsius (° C) to Fahrenheit (° F) and vice versa.Com this app you discover the two values ​​in a simple and functional touch. Try it! Two scales that measure different but the same criterion temperature. Celsius preferred to consider the zero temperature freezing point of water and 100 as the temperature of boiling water water. Have Fahrenheit used other criteria. For the zero point determined using a mixture of water, crushed ice, salt and ammonia. Have to point 100, used his own body temperature, something close to 37 degrees celsius we know. Do you want to call someone or a company and do not want them to have your number? Hide Number is the solution. Block your cell phone number and don’t be identified by caller ID boxes and other caller identification systems. When enabled, Hide Number will hide your telephone number from caller identifiers on mobile and landlines, so that the other party receives the call as "Private" or "Unknown" or "Hidden". You don't need to keep changing the general settings of your Android every time you wish to make a hidden call anymore. The app provides an easy way for you to enable and disable the sending of your number or ID to other phones or caller ID identifiers. * PLEASE NOTE: The application does not allow hiding the originator of SMS messages. The application may not block your phone number for calls to emergency services. Your network-operator must support hiding your caller ID, Indian cell phone operators don't support that! In india the blocking of caller id, CLIR, Caller Line Identification Restriction, is only available in some carriers, ex. Airtel, in post-paid plans with additional cost. ✔ FULLY COMPATIBLE with a wide number of GSM operators worldwide ✔ *** Features *** ✔ Hide your caller ID for outbound calls. ✔ Hide Caller ID for specific numbers only (Block list / Black List) ✔ Status bar notification, indicating when the application is running and if it is hiding the ID of your calls. ✔ Once you buy the application, you are entitled to all its future upgrades. ✔ The application allows you to add a custom block code provided by your mobile operator. ✔ Widget to turn on / off the app functionality. ** Important Notes - Read before you buy ** ✔ Hide Number will work with GSM operators from different countries. ✔ If after activating the program, your number continues to be shown to the other party, contact your mobile service provider and request activation of the service "blocking or barring outbound caller ID". Some operators may charge for this service. ✔ For suggestions and comments do not forget to send us an e-mail so we can get in touch. The comments field of the Market doesn’t let we know your e-mail. ✔✔ Attention ✔✔ Test the app by calling any number and check if the ID was blocked. If it does not work with your operator, you have 15 minutes to return the application to the Market and get your money back. * Operators BR * ✔ TIM – Ok. ✔ Vivo – Ok. ✔ Oi – Need to request activation of the service. ✔ Claro – Need to request activation of the service. ✔ Aeiou – To be tested. ✔ CTBC – To be tested. ✔ Nextel – To be tested. ✔ Sercomtel – To be tested. * Operators Other * ✔ Telecom Italia Mobile - Ok ✔ Wind Italia - Ok ✔ Vodafone - Ok ✔ CTMR Cel - Ok ✔ T-Mobile - US - Ok ✔ Teleacre Cel - Ok ✔ H3G - Ok ✔ ATL Algar - Ok ✔ Telesc Cel - Ok ✔ AT&T - Ok ✔ Red Pocket Mobile USA - Ok ✔ Simple Mobile - Ok ✔ Airtel India Post-paid - Maybe ✔ Simobil Vodafone Slovenia - Ok ✔ Bouygues Telecom - France - Ok Icon by Http://www.androidicons.com (licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License.)

O aplicativo tem o objetivo de fazer o controle financeiro no período de um ano. Baseia-se em dados de recebimento e gasto de dinheiro. Pode-se inserir informações de eventos que já aconteceram como uma conta que já foi paga ou eventos futuros, como uma conta que ainda não foi paga. Com as informações em mãos, o sistema mostra ao usuário a possibilidade de verificar o status atual, passado e futuro da sua conta. Baseando-se nesses dados, o usuário sabe se é capaz de assumir mais dívidas, se tem que se conter um pouco mais nos gastos, etc. Enfim, analisando o presente e o futuro, pode-se planejar melhor os próximos passos. Quando o saldo for negativo, ele é mostrado em vermelho e um alerta é emitido ao usuário. O saldo mensal é mostrado em forma de gráfico. Para maiores informações verificar o endereço http://gilbertookuyama.blogspot.com/2011/07/controle-financeiro-anual.html The application aims to make the financial control within one year. Based on data receipt and expenditure of money. You can insert information from events that have already happened as an account that has been paid or future events, such as an account that has not been paid. With the information in hand, the system shows the user the ability to check the current status, past and future of your business. Based on these data, the user knows it is able to take on more debt, it has to contain a little more spending, etc.. Finally, analyzing the present and future, we can better plan the next steps. When the balance is negative, it is shown in red and a warning is issued to the user. The monthly balance is shown in graph form. For more information check the address http://gilbertookuyama.blogspot.com/2011/07/controle-financeiro-anual.html

Não é automação comercial. É controle de vendas para autônomos. Controle suas vendas na palma da mão e não esqueça de fazer suas cobranças. - Cadastro de clientes (simples); - Cadastro das vendas por categoria; - Notificação de cobrança; - Emissão de relatórios (clientes e Categorias); - Exportar relatório para PDF. - Backup e Restauração; - Proteção por senha (opcional); - Pagamento total ou parcial. Se você trabalha como autônomo certamente enfrenta dificuldades para controlar suas vendas e cobranças. Controle de Vendas é um aplicativo desenvolvido totalmente em português, que tem como objetivo auxiliar você na hora de registrar suas vendas. É possível criar um cadastro de clientes e vendas, receber notificações de cobranças, emitir relatórios para visualização em tela ou imprimir em PDF e fazer backup dos dados. E tudo isso pode ser protegido por uma senha, garantindo a segurança de suas informações no Android. Recomenda-se fazer o backup dos dados antes da atualização, pois qualquer falha pode ocorrer a perda dos dados. Uma vez feito o backup em uma última versão o mesmo somente abrirá com o aplicativo atualizado, em caso de problemas verifique se tem uma nova atualização. Duvidas favor entrar em contato por e-mail. There is business automation. It sales for autonomous control. Control your sales on the palm and do not forget to make your charges. - Registry of customers (simple); - Register of sales by category; - Notification of collection; - Reporting (clients and categories); - Export report to PDF. - Backup and Restore; - Password protection (optional); - Full or partial payment. If you work as standalone certainly faces difficulties to manage their sales and collections. Sales Control is an application developed entirely in Portuguese, which aims to assist you aim at the time of registering their sales. You can create a customer base and sales and receive notifications of collection, reporting for viewing on screen or print to PDF and back up data. And all this can be password protected, ensuring the security of your information on Android. It is recommended that you backup your data before upgrading, because any failure can occur data loss. Once backed up in a final version it only opens with the updated application, in case of problems check that you have a new update. Questions please contact by email.

Color blindness accessibility toolkit The toolkit provides three functionalities for color deficient people: 1) Accessibility filter - Allows the user with one of the two main types of daltonism (deuteranopia and protanopia) to extract information form images in which it would otherwise not be possible due to the difficulty from these users to distinguish red/green contrast. 2) Color highlight tool - Allows the user to choose a color which will be highlighted in the whole picture. The other colors will be converted to gray scale. Specially useful for images with color captions. 3) Simulation tool - Allows the user to simulate how the image would be seen by someone who has deuteranopia or protanopia. All the tools can be applied to either images chosen from the gallery or taken from the camera. Additionally, the accessibility and simulation tools can be applied continuously to the camera's image (continuous mode, which needs the OpenCV library).

description: - Look up English words by how they sound – you don’t need to know how to spell the word! This dictionary will allow you to fin d the word you’re looking for even if you don’t know how to spell it in English. To do this, enter ‘phonetic search’ mode and start typing in the approximate sound of the word in Russian letters, for example, key-in: “ПИПЛ” and get “PEOPLE”; “СКАЙ” and get “SKY”! - The translations of English words given by this dictionary correspond to the meanings that native English speaking people associate with them. For example, “PANOPLY” - "ШИРОКОЕ РАЗНООБРАЗИЕ", "JAUNDICE" - "ЖЕЛТУХА" (illness), "DOUCHE" - "СПРИНЦОВКА". You might be surprised, but many existing dictionaries translate these words incorrectly: "PANOPLY" as "ДОСПЕХИ", "JAUNDICE" as "ЖЕЛЧНОСТЬ" and "DOUCHE" as "ДУШ". - You can look up word combinations. For example, we enter: “GIVE IN”, and get “УСТУПАТЬ”, "GIVE UP", and get "БРОСАТЬ", "LOOK FOR", and get "ИСКАТЬ" Or; we enter Russian words: "ПРОЙТИ КАК", and get "КАК ПРОЙТИ ДО..?" and then get the translation “HOW CAN I GET TO ..?” - Search for phrases in the dictionary by key words. We have over 50,000 phrases, examples of word usage, idiomatic expressions! Key word search makes translation much easier. For example, you need to translate: “TO COCK A SNOOK AT” We enter: “snook cock” or ‘cock snook” and the dictionary find the phrase and give you its translation: "ВЫРАЗИТЬ ПРЕЗРЕНИЕ К". For comparison ☺, here are online translations: "ПОДНИМАТЬ СНУК В " , "ПЕТУХ ДЛИННЫЙ НОС В", "ПЕТУХ ПОКАЗАЛ КУКИШ С МАСЛОМ" etc. - Works offline! - The dictionary accepts all grammatical forms of English words, displays transcription, orthographic variants, part of speech, and accent. You’re about to download a free/demo version of this dictionary, which contains ads. If you like our dictionary, please purchase the full version, and get rid of the annoying ads forever! ** Русский ** О некоторых особенностях Англо-русского/русско-английского словаря BD (Brilliant Dictionary): - Поиск английских слов по звучанию – как слышим так и пишем. Словарь позволяет найти английское слово даже если неизвестно, как оно пишется. В режиме "фонетического поиска" вводим приблизительное звучание слова русскими буквами - как слышим так и пишем. Например, вводим "ПИПЛ" - получаем "PEOPLE"; вводим "СКАЙ" - получаем "SKY" - Переводы английских слов соответствуют тому смыслу, как его понимают англоговорящие люди. Например, "PANOPLY" - ШИРОКОЕ РАЗНООБРАЗИЕ, "JAUNDICE" - "ЖЕЛТУХА" (болезнь), "DOUCHE" - "СПРИНЦОВКА". Это выгодно отличает наш словарь от большинства словарей, в которых "PANOPLY" переводится как "ДОСПЕХИ", "JAUNDICE" как "ЖЕЛЧНОСТЬ" и "DOUCHE" как "ДУШ" - Возможен поиск словосочетаний. Например, вводим "GIVE IN", получаем перевод "УСТУПАТЬ", вводим "GIVE UP", получаем "БРОСАТЬ", вводим "LOOK FOR", получаем "ИСКАТЬ" Или: вводим русские слова "ПРОЙТИ КАК", словарь предлагает для перевода "КАК ПРОЙТИ ДО..?" и затем получаем перевод "HOW CAN I GET TO ..?" - Поиск фраз по ключевым словам. Словарь содержит более 50 000 примеров применения слов и идиоматических выражений. Поиск по ключевым словам существенно облегчает их поиск. Например, вам нужно перевести "TO COCK A SNOOK AT" Вводим "snook cock" или "cock snook" и словарь найдет это выражение и его перевод: "ВЫРАЗИТЬ ПРЕЗРЕНИЕ К" Для сравнения приводим примеры переводов этого выражения популярными он-лайн переводчиками: "ПОДНИМАТЬ СНУК В " , "ПЕТУХ ДЛИННЫЙ НОС В", "ПЕТУХ ПОКАЗАЛ КУКИШ С МАСЛОМ" ...и т.д. - Словарь работает без подключения к интернету - Словарь распознает все грамматические формы английских слов, показывает транскрипцию, варианты орфографии, часть речи и ударение. Бесплатная версия содержит рекламные вставки. Сделав покупку полной версии вы от них избавитесь навсегда!

description: Toddler Explore! - Interactive Picture Book. This is the evolution of the classic picture bock. developer: Government of the Province of Alberta
description: Stay current on Alberta’s wildfire situation. See where wildfires are burning in Alberta and how they impact you. Get up-to-date information on wildfire conditions and hazard. Join our conversation on Facebook and Twitter. Report a wildfire. Features: • Easy access to Alberta’s wildfire map with up-to-date wildfire information. • Area-specific updates on wildfire situations. • Area-specific alerts for extreme wildfire situations. • Direct contact information for Alberta’s wildfire-related websites, phone numbers and email addresses. • Report a wildfire. Push notifications are not intended as the sole source of wildfire information as their settings can be modified based on user preferences.

developer: Government of the Province of Alberta
description: The Air Quality Health Index (AQHI) is a tool available for Albertans to learn what the air quality around various Alberta communities means to individual health. The AQHI provides a number from 1 to 10 to indicate the level of health risk associated with local air quality. The higher the AQHI number, the greater the health risk and need to take precautions. This app provides updated AQHI readings and daily forecasts for more than 20 communities. The AQHI is paired with advice about limiting exposure to air pollution and adjusting activity levels when air quality is poor. Special community level messaging is displayed when odour or visibility events occur. For more information visit: airquality.alberta.ca.

description: Each year, Service Alberta publishes a list of Alberta’s top baby names, compiled from the Registration of Live Birth forms that are completed by parents. Alberta Baby Names is a fun and easy to use Android application that helps you find the perfect baby name. Features: • Access lists of Alberta’s baby names since 1980 by year and gender • Build, edit, and view a list of favorite names • View name popularity rankings by year • Search for names • Over 81,000 names available

developer: Government of the Province of Alberta
description: Call of the Land is Alberta's premier agricultural news program. Airing five days-a-week, this nine minute agricultural radio program, produced by Alberta Agriculture and Rural Development, is broadcast to a daily audience of over 110,000. For over 60 years, stories have kept the agricultural community current on the latest agricultural technologies, research findings, production methods and marketing trends, as well as government programs and policies. The Call of the Land Calendar keeps listeners informed about upcoming agricultural events.
release_text: In addition to stories on the latest agricultural technologies, research findings, production methods and market trends, new in this version, find upcoming agriculture events in your area.

developer: Government of the Province of Alberta
description: Need to find an Alberta Registry Agent or need more information about registry services in Alberta? With the Registry Services application you can find a Registry Agent using your current location, city or postal code. Alberta Registry Agents are a network of community-based service centres, offering one-stop shopping for a wide range of registration, information, and licensing services on behalf of the Government of Alberta. Services provided by Registry Agents include motor vehicle registrations, driver licensing and testing, personal property (lien) searches and registrations, land title searches, corporate registry services, and vital statistics certificate requests.

Determine respiratory rate by tapping breath rate. Animated baby provides visual feedback with a breathing noise as audio feedback. The rate is determined by the median interval of the recent consecutive intervals (between the most recent taps) provided that these taps are consistent. The user keeps tapping until this consistency is reached.
release_text: A settings page has been added which allows the user to choose how many of the most recent taps are included in the RR calculation. In addition they can choose from one of 5 options for the consistency threshold and whether they wish the app to vibrate when making the breathing noises. When the volume is set to 0, the app will vibrate instead of the breathing sounds. Fixed a bug that caused the application to crash quickly on a few devices.

description: An Android application for the popular Tracks todo list ( http://www.getontracks.org ). Features: * Can be used with any Tracks server. * Allows full creation and editing of tasks. * Allows editing and creation of tasks and projects. * Color-coded due dates, just like the web interface. * HTTPS support, with option to accept self-signed certificates. * Support for alternate HTTP/HTTPS ports. Want to try Tracks for Android but don't have a Tracks installation? Check out the hosted tracks options at http://www.getontracks.org/wiki/Tracks-Hosting . NOTE: This is the donation version. An identical free version is also available in the market.
release_text: * Added options to add and edit contexts. * Added options to add projects. * Added optional +1 and +7 buttons, like in the web interface.

description: Hot pursuit! Street outlaws! Serious asphalt shredding motorcycle Mayhem! Nitro hot biker babes! Loads of cash...DEATH & DESTRUCTION!...   This ain’t another day at the office, amigo! This is Top Bike Race Pacific Free 3-D! The motorcycle racing game that everyone is buzzing about. The question is…Are you man enough to saddle-up a street racing speed-demon motorcycle and battle your way to become king of the highway! ACCELERATE HARD TO BECOME A LEGEND OF THE ROAD! Top Bike Race puts you behind the handlebars of your own motorcycle on the most reckless and deadly strip of asphalt on the planet. You’ve got the road in front of you, the wind on your face, and a smokin’ hot babe on the back of your motorcycle! This is no-holds-barred, winner takes all! Drive FAST like a fearless master and you’ll collect stacks of cash and live the good life! TOP BIKE RACE GAME FEATURES: • Mind-blowing action, strategy, and big fun! • Simple intuitive gameplay. • Dazzling graphics and sound effects that pop. • Waves of crazy reckless drivers and tricky obstacles. • Share and compare scores. • Optimization for all the latest mobile devices. • Updates to ensure flawless gameplay and new bonus features. STAY SHARP! Every other driver on the road is out to make you crash and burn, including the POLICE! …These guys are in a bad mood and the last thing they want to do is read you your rights! It’s much easier for them to run their squad car right into your motorcycle at full speed and send you tumbling into a fireball on the side of the highway! HANG ON TIGHT AND CRANK UP THE THROTTLE! Top Bike Race is the addictive and thrilling racing/adventure game that you just can’t put down. See how long you can survive on the deadly highway surrounded by high-octane dangers! Can you become a free-living ace of the open road?… Feel free to drop us a line! We’re always listening to your suggestions to improve Top Bike Race! If you have any issues with the game, just contact us and we will help you! ** Are you loving Top Bike Race? We’d love to hear about it! Please take a moment to leave us a nice review. It really helps! **

This application is a babyphone like who informs you by a phone call to an other phone when your baby starts to cry (or made another noise). Settings: (Use the test mode to make adjustments) Call number- (phone number that will call your mobile when noise is detected). Threshold - Corresponds to the red bar on the main screen. It \'s the level at which the sound will be recorded. Sensitivity - Microphone Sensitivity (depends on phone model). Duration before warning - Adjusts the number of times the trigger before the detector is call. Security code SMS - You can control your machine by an SMS from the mobile target with the message that code tracking, then the desired function: To call: code + appel (eg 5555 appel). To stop detection: code + stop (eg 5555 stop). To start detection: code + start (eg 5555 start). Lullaby - Play a lullaby when a noise is detected. You can also enable or disable this feature by clicking the music note. How to start : -Place your phone near your child, be sure to use a charger or make sure your battery is charged. Press start button or start via the menu. The phone automatically switches to silent, so that if any message or phone call does not come to disturb your baby. When the phone alarm is activated and the phone dials another phone, you can either answer the call or reject it. If you answer the call, the Android phone is automatically in speakerphone mode, so that your child is able to hear you. When you finish your call, monitoring will be automatically restarted. CAUTION: This is not a substitution of the role of parents. For best results of our application please take that into account: 1. If you use Task killers devices \, please disable them. They can stop the process of monitoring and alarm monitor baby. 2. Please check if you have a good GSM / CDMA. We use a phone call to alert you when the baby gets noisy. 3. Please do not forget to check the battery in your phone or put your phone to load 4. Test all parameters before using this application for monitoring your baby. CAUTION: This application is for you providing assistance in monitoring your baby, it does not replace the vigilance of an adult.

The cross-country skiing techniques app offers a comprehensive insight into current techniques in the sport. Members of the Swiss national team demonstrate all the steps in both the classic and the skating style. The app is intended especially for team leaders and trainers but also for ambitious skiiers who would like to improve their technique. Short videos show how to execute the individual steps correctly from several different perspectives - in real time, slow motion and with diagrams. In order to study individual movement sequences in greater detail, it is possible to move the pictures both forwards and backwards individually. Still pictures with explanatory texts illustrate the crucial phases of the movement and help users improve their technique so as to ski more efficiently. Once the app has been downloaded, the videos can be played without an Internet connection. Thanks to its functional design, the app can be used directly on the ski trail.

Let your toddler learn some words by clicking on the right image. It will be fun for them. This application uses text to speech output. It's up to the user to configure the phone which text to speech voice to use. You can install third party voices like Ivona (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ivona.tts) or search for text to speech in Google Play Store.

Diese APP richtet sich an alle, welche eine Mitgliedschaft bei IKEA FAMILY Schweiz haben. Mit der neuen Schweizer IKEA FAMILY App hast du deine IKEA FAMILY Karte garantiert immer dabei. Das Plus: Du profitierst nicht nur von deinen gewohnten Vorteilen, sondern erhältst aktuelle Produkte- und Restaurantangebote aus deinem Schweizer IKEA Einrichtungshaus auch immer als Erster. Wähle dein bevorzugtes Schweizer IKEA Einrichtungshaus und filtere so alle für dich relevanten Angebote. Um deine Schweizer IKEA FAMILY Karte in der App zu aktivieren musst du nur deinen Namen, Vornamen und Geburtsdatum eingeben. Bitte beachte, dass diese APP nur in der Schweiz, mit einer gültigen Schweizer Mitgliedschaft nutzbar ist. Blättere jederzeit durch das digitale IKEA FAMILY live oder HEJ Magazin, besuch uns auf Facebook, YouTube, dem IKEA life at home Blog oder lass dich von unseren Pinterest Boards inspirieren. This app is intended for all who have a membership at IKEA FAMILY Switzerland. With the new Swiss IKEA FAMILY app you have your card IKEA FAMILY always guaranteed. The plus: You will benefit not only from your usual benefits, but receive current product and Restaurant offers from your local store Swiss always first. Choose your favorite Swiss local store and so to filter all relevant for you offers. To activate your Swiss IKEA FAMILY card in the app you need to enter your full name and date of birth. Note that this app is available only in Switzerland, with a valid Swiss membership. Skim any time through the digital IKEA FAMILY live or HEJ magazine, visit us on Facebook, YouTube, the IKEA life at home blog or let yourself be inspired by our Pinterest boards.

*** Neu: Pro-Version mit vielen zusätzlichen Funktionen erhältlich Mit dieser App können die Muskeln des menschlichen Bewegungsapparates ganz einfach gelernt werden. Für jeden der wichtigen Muskeln (über 120) sind Ursprung, Ansatz, Innervation und Funktion erfasst. Diese kann man sich selber nach dem Prinzip des Karteikarten-Systems abfragen. Für einen schnelleren Lernerfolg können die Muskeln auch nach einzelnen Körperregionen separiert abgefragt werden. Es handelt sich hiermit um die lite-Version, welche ich ursprünglich für mich selber und meine Mitstudenten entwickelt habe, um möglichste einfach die Muskeln lernen zu können. In der Zwischenzeit habe ich die App zu einer Pro-Version mit vielen weiteren Funktionen erweitert. Die lite-Version wird selbstverständlich auch in Zukunft gratis bleiben und mit weiteren Updates versorgt werden. Solltet ihr Rückmeldungen oder Verbesserungsvorschläge haben, dann bitte melden an info@lukapps.ch . Danke! Weitere Funktionen folgen demnächst! *** New: Pro version available with many additional features With this app, the muscles of the human body can be learned easily. For each of the major muscles (120) origin, insertion, innervation and function are covered. This may be checked according to the principle of the index card system itself. For a faster learning results, the muscles can be queried also separated for individual body regions. It hereby is the lite version, which I initially developed for myself and my fellow students to greatest possible simply to learn the muscles. In the meantime, I've expanded the app to Pro version with many more features. The lite version will of course remain free in the future and be provided with further updates. Should you have feedback or suggestions for improvement, then please log in info@lukapps.ch . Thank you! More functions will follow soon!

Try to evade all obstacles and fly as far as possible! Simple and fast one finger touch controls and 3 different Game Styles to select: Easy, Classic and Extreme. Play now, it's free and unlimited! Choose different Obstacles in Easy and Classic Modes, or try the new Extreme Mode with moving Obstacles. Compete online with thousands of other players in the online leaderboard! NEW: 7 Happy Birds to choose from and 3 difficulty Levels and Game Styles! Try the Xtreme Mode with moving Obstacles and Leaderboards for each Game mode! Absolutely addictive flappybird Gameplay, play Happy Birds now, it's free and unlimited! NEW FEATURES! ***** Choose between 6 different happy, funny and angry birds ***** New 3 difficulty Levels - Easy, Classic and Xtreme Game Mode ***** Change Obstacles, Moving Obstacles in Xtreme Mode ***** Google Game Auto-login / stay offline functions ***** precise collision ***** same style, new game ***** new haptic / vibration effects ***** addictive gameplay ***** adjusted difficulty & online leaderboard ***** new low-res retro style pixel graphics ***** watch the creation of this game on youtube ***** indie game, free and unlimited instructions: Touch the display at any position to let your Bird fly. description: Rentz, also known as Renz, Renț, King, Barbu or Bart is a card game for 4 or 6 players, you against the computers. It consists of 8 independent mini games. Please bare in mind that the rules may vary by country. The rules are very easy, actually there is just one: Play a card of the same suit as the first one on the table. For getting tricks (taking all cards of the table), the card with the highest value counts. Every player is entitled by rotation to choose one of the 8 available contracts. When you close the application or you get interrupted, don't worry, you can always continue the mini game you left before... The mini games: King of Hearts: -80 pts for taking him Queens: -20 pts for each Queen taken Diamonds: -10 pts for each Diamond taken No Tricks: -10 pts for each trick taken Rules 1-4 together: All the above mentioned rules together Get Tricks: +50 pt s for each trick taken Get Club 10: +50 pts for getting Club 10 (looks like a clover) Rentz: Here, none of the above rules count. You must play all cards as fast as possible. Each suit is started with 8. If you are unable to play a card you must pass. The first player to get rid of all cards gets 300 pts, second 200 pts, third 150 pts, fourth 100 pts, fifth 50 pts, sixth 0 pts. The winner is the one with the most points. If you find any errors or you have suggestions, feel free to contact me through my email. Other Applications by SJT: • VerbDroid verb conjugator German • VerbDroid verb conjugator Swedish • VerbDroid verb conjugator Dutch • VerbDroid verb conjugator Romanian • VerbDroid verb conjugator French • Aero Abbreviation • Viking Triangle

nextstop Österreich, public transport schedule for Austria - Transit Nextstop provides an information service in real time for all public transport lines of Austria City. The current timetable and information of departure times of all stations are at your hands in no time. Additionally, to allow a better orientation, stations can be displayed on a road map. For route calculation, the departure and destination points can be either stations or positions on the road map. Nextstop shows you your route, from door to door including all footpaths. With nextstop you get important information for your travel all the time and always up to date. Where and when with nextstop Start nextstop and see immediately the departures of surrounding stations! description: Track your time with one button click! You can track time with Time Tracker for any activity you want and of course add your own activities! On the statistics page of Time Tracker you can see all information about time tracking for current day, week or month. In the nearest future it will be possible to export information about time tracking. When Time Tracker starts you see the list of available activities to track time. To start time tracking with Time Tracker for some activity just click on it and you will see confirmation window “Start tracking time?” After you confirm, Time Tracker activity will be highlighted with green color. This way you can see that now time is tracking for this activity with Time Tracker. To stop tracking with Time Tracker time just click stop button near activity and time tracking will be stopped. On the statistics page of Time Tracker you can see the sequence of events for current day, the time tracking statistics for current day, time tracking statistics for current week and time tracking statistics for current month. There is also a possibility to clear all time tracking statistics in Time Tracker. Note, that for now maximum period for time tracking is one month. All time tracked statistics in Time Tracker which is older that one month will be deleted. Now it is impossible to export time tracking statistics from Time Tracker but this feature will be implemented in the next version. The most interesting part of Time Tracker is editing current activities for time tracking and creating new ones. On the settings page of Time Tracker you will see the list of all available activities for time tracking. You can make time tracking activities visible or invisible on your main page by checking and unchecking “Show” checkbox near each activity. You can also change caption for existing time track activities by clicking “Change text” button. If you click “New” button which is present near each time track activity you will create new time track activity with the same image. For now it is not possible to select new images for time tracking activities. So basically what you can do is create copy of existing time track activity just with different caption for it. This way you can create unlimited amount of time tracking activities in Time Tracker. It is not possible to delete default time track activities but you can delete activities which was created by you in Time Tracker. Please, don't downvote if something doesn't work or if you think some crucial features are missing. Just write me all your e-mail at triladroid@gmail.com and I'll try to help with all your problems!

Maths game for kids is a funny game to practice the school mathematics with sums, subtractions, multiplications and divisions .Let this educative game take parte of your life! Thanks to its three different levels, even the youngest kids will be able to enjoy learning maths! • Addition, subtraction, multiplication and division. • 3 levels per operation. • Each level is adapted to what children learn in each maths course. • Sums and subtractions use numbers between 1 and 4 in the easy level, 4 and 8 in the medium, and between 8 and 12 the last level. • Easy multiplications use 1, 2 and 3; medium, 4, 5 and 6; and difficult 7, 8 and 9. • At the end of a game the maximum nine results are shown. • Each result is saved within the date of the game. • Only the fist result per day is saved, although the next results are shown in the screen in order to let the boy or girl see his or her maths score. • The time of the game depends on the difficulty, because the more difficult the game is, the more time is needed. • It is allow to fail the result of an operation, and a funny draw appear to notify the error . This application has an easy and funny interface with light colors in order to make it simple and comprehensible for children. Download and enjoy with one of the best kids maths games.

description: ハロージョブ [求人・転職・アルバイトまとめ] あなたにピッタリの求人が見つかる！ 仕事探しサポートアプリ！！ 求人・転職・アルバイト情報サイトをジャンル別にまとめたアプリです。 サービス,美容,医療(看護師,医師等),金融,不動産,インターネット,保険,IT,企画,事務,販売,経理,保育士,看護師,その他人気職種を網羅、 希望の職種に最適な求人サイトが便利に探せます。 また、求人情報サイトが配信する新着情報をまとめて受け取ることができます。 欲しい新着求人情報がすばやくチェックできます。 主な機能 ・求人・転職サイトをジャンル別に検索 IT系、医療・介護系、販売・飲食系、派遣、アルバイトなど、各ジャンルに特化したサイトが一目で探せます。 求人・転職総合サイトを希望の職種に強いサイトでさらに絞ることも可能です。 希望職種のジャンルを選んでいくだけで、あなたに最適な求人情報が見つかります！ さらに細かく（未経験OK、賞与、育児と両立、英語など語学力、渋谷・原宿、個人ノルマ、フレックスタイム、資格取得支援、新卒・第2新卒OK、正社員登用ありなど） リンク先で調べることができます。 ・欲しい新着求人情報をまとめて受け取れます 希望の職種を選んで保存しておけば、選択した新着求人情報がホーム画面に表示されます。 アプリを開くだけで、いつでもどこでも最新情報がチェックできます！ ・ブックマーク機能 よく使うサイトはブックマークに登録しておけば、いつでもすぐにアクセスできます。 ■掲載ジャンル 転職・求人総合(IT/サービス・販売/医療・介護/営業・事務/製造・物流/高収入/etc...) 医療・介護系 IT系 販売・飲食系 派遣 アルバイト ■掲載サイト(順不同・抜粋) タウンワーク イーキャリア イーキャリアJobsearch an リクナビNEXT リクナビ派遣 フロム・エー ナビ マイナビ転職エージェント マイナビバイト マイナビ派遣 @type 女の転職@type CareerIndex Find Job! ジョブセンス eアイデム とらばーゆ 介護求人ナビ はたらいく ナース専科 求人＠飲食店.com etc... (2013年9月11日現在) ■エリア 東京,神奈川,横浜,埼玉,千葉,大阪,名古屋,広島,静岡,石川,他日本全国 ブラウザ版もご利用いただけます。 http://netdeokaimono.info/job/ ご意見・ご要望などお寄せください。 info@netdeokaimono.info ■ご注意 掲載サイトは随時変化します。 スクリーンショットにあるものと同一とは限りませんのでご了承ください。 各掲載サイト及び新着情報の内容については各サイトにお問い合わせください。 各掲載求人サイトにて雇用形態(正社員・契約社員・派遣・アルバイト等)、 採用条件（未経験,英語など語学,30代,残業,賞与,休日）などご確認下さい。 当アプリは求人情報を便利に探すためのツール・リンク集です。 掲載求人サイト及び新着情報の内容・ご利用に関して、なんら保証するものではありません。 掲載サイトのご利用、求人への応募等に関しての責任は一切負いかねますのでご了承ください。

Pink Android Battery Widget indicates the battery charge level of your device. Battery is a small, sleek and elegant app that will help you follow the current battery percentage on your Android device. Pink Android Battery Widget shows the exact battery level. Pressing this widget allows to change Battery, Display, WiFi, GPS, Bluetooth Settings and display advanced battery info (voltage, temperature, status, etc.). Also allows to set Alarm clock. After installation, you must manually add the widget to the home screen. How to add widget to the home screen: 1.On your home screen of your Android device, tap any blank or "empty" area and hold down your finger. 2.The "Add to Home screen" window will appear. Tap on "Widgets". 3.List of all the installed Widgets on your Android device will appear. 4.Select the widget to add to your home screen. Note: On Android 4.0 add widget by selecting icon widgets menu near apps menu.
release_text: - Support more devices (tablets) - Compliance with the new policy Google Play (no ads in the notification bar, only banners)

description: SIGA Chile (Sistema de Información Georeferenciada Accesible) es una aplicación gestionada por la Universidad Diego Portales (UDP) con el financiamiento del Servicio Nacional de la Discapacidad (SENADIS Chile) y está dirigida a personas con discapacidad física y público en general. Su función es informar sobre los niveles de accesibilidad de los lugares y edificios de uso público y permitir su evaluación por parte de los usuarios. La información generada por los usuarios registrados en la plataforma da cuenta de cinco criterios de accesibilidad específicos: existencia de estacionamientos, baños accesibles, entorno del lugar, circulación interior e información accesible. FOLLOW Chile (Accessible Geo-referenced Information System) is an application managed by the Universidad Diego Portales (UDP) with funding from the National Disability Service (SENADIS Chile) and is aimed at people with physical disabilities and the general public. Its function is to report on the levels of accessibility of places and public buildings and allow evaluation by users. The information generated by registered users on the platform realizes specific accessibility five criteria: existence of parking, accessible restrooms, place setting, internal movement and information accessible.

Color Lines is a game play on 9×9 board with balls of seven different colors. The object is to connect 5 or more balls of the same color to a horizontal, vertical or diagonal line. The player can move one ball per turn, and the player may only move a ball to a particular place if there is a path (linked set of vertical and horizontal empty cells) between the current position of the ball and the desired destination. If the player does form such lines of at least five balls of the same color, the balls in those lines disappear, and he gains one turn, i.e. he can move another ball. If not, three new balls are added, and the game continues until the board is full. For more challenges and fun, hard mode was introduced, in this mode there will be frozen balls appear after several turns, these balls are unmovable. If you remove a line with frozen balls, the points also can be doubled.

Mills(Nine Men's Morris) is an abstract strategy board game for two players that emerged from the Roman Empire. Each player has nine pieces, or "men", which move among the board's twenty-four spots. The object of the game is to leave the opposing player with fewer than three pieces or no legal moves. The game begins with an empty board. Players take turns placing their pieces on empty spots. If a player is able to form a straight row of three pieces along one of the board's lines (i.e. not diagonally), he has a "mill" and may remove one of his opponent's pieces from the board; removed pieces may not be placed again. Players must remove any other pieces first before removing a piece from a formed mill. Once all eighteen pieces have been used, players take turns moving. To move, a player slides one of his pieces along a board line to an empty adjacent spot. If he cannot do so, he has lost the game. As in the placement stage, a player who aligns three of his pieces on a board line has a mill and may remove one of his opponent's pieces, avoiding the removal of pieces in mills if at all possible. Any player reduced to two pieces is unable to remove any more opposing pieces and thus loses the game. Once a player is reduced to three pieces, his pieces may "fly" to any empty spots, not only adjacent ones.

description: ▼台灣區遊戲榜TOP1▼ 首款縱版3D飛行射擊遊戲，為廣大打飛機愛好者量身打造。 雷電3D繼承了街機雷電的經典玩法，擁有精彩的全3D畫面、豐富的關卡與戰機，為玩家帶來原汁原味的飛行射擊體驗。 ---遊戲特色--- 【3D遊戲畫面】 隨時領略全3D畫面，欣賞超真實的空中特技與遊戲場景！ 【多款世界戰機】 自動激光戰機、北極光戰機、虎牙戰機、流星散彈戰機，還有數種僚機配備！ 【精美彈幕特效】 上千種彈幕組合，震撼的連環爆炸，盡情追求爽快刺激！ 【經典街機版雷電】 傳承雷電遊戲精髓，再現原汁原味的飛行射擊經典回憶！ --遊戲內容-- ▲進化 — 超前3D遊戲體驗！ 從都市到太空，質感十足的場景令人身臨其境 空中特技豐富，輾轉騰挪的敵機增添遊戲樂趣 ▲激戰 — 彈幕盛宴精彩紛呈！ 精選千種組合，變化莫測的彈幕引爆操作慾望 關卡緊張刺激，各具特色的Boss帶來無盡挑戰 ▲火爆 — 爽快感受熱血沸騰！ 遊戲特效華麗，宏大的爆炸場面震撼玩家心靈 戰鬥氛圍火爆，激情的音樂音效刺激聽覺感受 ▲方便 — 手感舒適節奏明快！ 玩法簡單易懂，流暢的觸控體驗提升戰鬥快感 休閒娛樂首選，快節奏遊戲進程隨時隨地暢玩 ▲榮譽 — 衝擊排名萬人景仰！ 全球玩家排名，精確的數據統計測量遊戲水平 衝擊最高分數，輝煌的戰鬥記錄隨時隨地分享 KooGame更多遊戲 ----------------------- 狂斬三國 三國大富翁 小魚大營救 ----------------------- 微博： http://weibo.com/koogame 網站： http://koogame.com

description: Use the phone camera to test your heart rate, simply put your finger on the camera, then touch the "Start" button to test the heart rate. If you carefully look at your finger against the light, you will find the light is dimmed when heart beats once, this app will automatically detect the rhythm of light and convert into number for your reference. It can ensure the displayed number accurate! Note: good lighting environment is very important to the accuracy of the test, you'd better sit back to the light or sunlight when using this app. The test is for reference only. If you have any questions, please consult the doctor!

description: Do you know？ Sudoku is a relatively new game. It started in 1970s in America. In 1980s a Japanese magazine officially named this game "Sudoku". It means that there is only one number in each grid. Ever since then, it's getting more and more popular in Japan. Around 2005, it became a worldwide common game, due to the popularity of the Internet. Game rules Sudoku game board contains 81 grids in 9 blocks, made up of 9 rows and 9 columns. The purpose is to put 9 numbers in blank grids and make sure that all 9 numbers in each row, each column and each block are all different. How to play: 1. Choose a grid. 2. Select one number based on the game rules. That's it! Game help Here are the tips to help you locate answers much quicker: 1. Highlight: when you choose any number on the board, all the same number that has been filled in will be highlighted! Now it becomes easier, right? If you don't want this, you can simply turn it off on the settings page. 2. Hint: When you get stuck, choose a grid and tap on the light bulb in the upper right corner. You will find the answer of that grid will just popup by itself! Please notice: the number of used hint will affect your final score! Notice: Three clears in one level will bring you to the higher difficulty level!
release_text: Update Ver3.4.3 Adjustment of game difficulty. Update Ver3.4.2 changed the Ad system. Update Ver3.4.1 Optimize layout Update Ver3.4 Fixed a bug Update Ver.3.2 Fixed a bug of the screen display

description: Kids Phonics 2 is aimed at children that have been learning the sounds of the alphabet and are ready to put their new knowledge of phonics to good use. This app is designed to help children understand how the sounds are put together to form words. Using phonics skills to sound out simple words is an important step towards literacy. This app aims to introduce this skill in a clear, simple way. Consonant-vowel-consonant words are amongst the simplest words to read and spell and are a great starting point for children developing literacy skills. The app contains over 70 consonant-vowel-consonant words and each one is used in a number of simple games. Children will see, hear, match and spell each word several times and build the skills needed to sound out other words. Tags: phonics, cvc, kids, children, read, reading, spelling, phonics.

After the turtle shells start to move, you will be shown where all the pizza(s) are hiding. Your job is to touch the shells to locate the pizza, in the correct order you were previously shown. For higher scoring touch the optional point shells before locating the pizza. Touch a shell in the wrong order and you will find Shredder. Avoid finding Shredder or the game is over!
release_text: Slowed down reveal for the hidden items to make game easier.

description: Glenn has drawn upon his 20-year experience as a clinical hypnotherapist to produce the two hypnotherapy recordings in this App. He has helped thousands of clients overcome a wide range of common and obscure fears and phobias. Both hypnotherapy sessions will help you to overcome any phobia or anxiety problem in a safe and natural way. Each track has been carefully scripted and constructed so that the recordings can be used to overcome any phobia. Both hypnotherapy sessions offer a different approach and can be used separately or in conjunction with each other. This App has been designed to conquer all types of phobia and anxiety including the fear of flying, heights, the dentist, sickness, agoraphobia, claustrophobia, spiders, needles, snakes, social phobia, thunderstorms, anxiety as well as any of the more obscure types of phobia. On the hypnotherapy recordings, you will hear Glenn’s acclaimed hypnotic vocal techniques which will guide you into a deep state of mental and physical relaxation. At this point you will be shown how to use the power of your own mind to safely remove or minimise the anxiety response. You will then feel safe and secure and be able to react in a normal way when you are faced with the situation that once caused you anxiety. The background sounds on each track have been recorded in certain keys and frequencies to help enhance the hypnotic effect and help to guide you into a deeply relaxed state of mental and physical relaxation. In this very receptive relaxed state you are also given a number of post hypnotic and direct suggestions to help you to overcome all problems associated with your phobia. There are also a number of carefully worded background affirmations, which echo and pan from left to right across the stereo range, ideal when using headphones. This App Includes: Hypnosis Audio Tracks • Release The Fear (awake ending) 35:08 mins • Take Back Control (sleep ending) 38:08 mins eBooks by Glenn Harrold • De-Stress - The 8 Golden Rules • The Ultimate Guide To Self Hypnosis • How To Use This App • About The Author Introduction music written by Glenn Harrold Individual background music pieces by Glenn Harrold and Christopher Lloyd Clarke This state of the art recording features: • The very latest hypnotherapy techniques and state-of-the-art digital recording technology. • Glenn's highly acclaimed hypnotic vocal techniques guiding you into a completely relaxed state of mind & body. • 60 BPM background sound effects recorded in specific musical keys and frequencies to compliment the hypnotic suggestions and deepen the relaxation effect. • Stereo-echoed affirmations, which pan from ear to ear across the stereo range - a deeply relaxing and unique effect. • Relaxing Pink Noise and Sea sounds. Glenn is one of the world's best-selling hypnotherapists with multi-million sales of his Apps, CDs, MP3s and 7 self-help books. He has over 20 years experience as a full-time hypnotherapist and works with many celebrity clients. Glenn has appeared on TV a number of times and his successful hypnotherapy sessions are often featured in newspaper and magazine articles.
release_text: Enhanced the app with improved audios and latest designs. More options to connect with Glenn and send your feedback.

description: A highly customizable Droid Eye Live Wallpaper for 2.1+ devices that support Live Wallpapers The original Droid Eye Live Wallpaper now with ability to choose your own custom color. I refuse to simple release my app with different colors and charge a fee for each one. You can change the animation to any color you want as many times as you want with just this 99 cent purchase. Features (Check Settings): - Color Changing (If you can choose option then you may need to make or remake a custom animation through the Custom Color Screen) - Ability to play intro on orientation change. - Have eye move from side to side as you swipe from homescreens or stay in the center. - Play Unlock sound (Is Muted when your phone is on Silent) - Many advance tweaks in setting you can make to perserve battery life, prevent crashes on slower devices and fine tune it to your needs. More features to come. Tested On: Droid (Froyo) and Nexus S (Gingerbread) Non Supported: Droid Eris HTC Hero How To Apply Live Wallpapers: On Homescreen > Menu Button > Wallpaper > Live Wallpapers > Choose Wallpaper or Long Press Home Screen > Wallpapers > Live Wallpapers > Choose Wallpaper If available you can configure wallpaper settings here. Press Set Wallpaper to activate it as your current wallpaper. Check website for FAQs then email for support. Be careful if you have a Task Killer you may need to add any Live Wallpaper to the Task Killers exclusion list. ALL LWP can be killed by Task Killers.

description: What's better than a parking game? Airport Parking obviously. If you're sick of playing with the boring old cars and trucks then you're in for something new with this stunning 3D game. You're the controller of an airport and it's your task to park all the airplanes coming in from flights. With 12 levels you're in for hours of fun. If you crash it's game over. So be careful where you're going as not only do you need to avoid obstacles in the way. But there's also other planes moving around the runway to take off. Keep you eyes open for movement around you and obstacles in the way and I' sure you will manage. Become the best pilot of all time in this stunning 3D Airport Sim. Features: - 12 levels with a huge variety of challenges. - Stunning 3D graphics. Fully optimized for mobile performance. - Moving scenes. No more static games. Fully immerse yourself in the life like scenes.

description: With over 70 herbs and spices, 50+ ingredients and 19 different meal styles, you'll never be lost in your kitchen again. Herbert the Herb & Spice Helper allows you to mix and match ingredients and cooking styles to see what combinations are best. Each herb and spice comes with a list of compatible herb and spices, and also what you can use instead, so you don't have to run to the supermarket at the last moment when you're cooking a meal.

Splatter Ball (for 2 player) is a simple local multiplayer arcade game. The goal is to score 3 times before your opponent can splatter you. The catch is that each player has only one button: jump. Players can jump, double jump, and jump off walls to turn around. If you don’t have any friends there is a 1 player mode. Features: • Fast paced local multiplayer (1-4 players) • 2 player or more on the same device • Game modes: Standard, Keeper, Coop, Kills, Free 4 All, and Survival • Unique gravity flipping level design • Great multiplayer tablet game Challenge your friends with 1 player, 2 player, 3 player, or 4 player. Great tablet multiplayer game. All the pixels were lovingly crafted for your enjoyment. Reviews: "I liked 2 player reactor, and I love to splatter my friends." “If you enjoy Pixel Craft Gun 3d Pro Multiplayer, then you should play this game.” “As hard as Super Hexagon.” “More impossible than the Impossible Game.” “Great indie game like Ridiculous Fishing.” "Play 2 player against your friends." "Love the 4 player multiplayer tablet game." "It makes the tablet impossible hexagon possible." "Love jumping block to block and on my friends heads." "Beautiful pixel to pixel art." "Craft wins over friends and foes." "The pixel art looks great on my tablet." "If you love mine craft then you will like this game."

***WELCOME TO SLEIGHRUNNER*** Fly Sanatas Sleigh as you deliver presents to the millions of children around the world! Use Rudolph's special red nose as a superpower to collect coins, dodge Rocket Christmas Trees and Ice Mines and most importantly, save Christmas! *Fast paced runner gameplay *Collect Chocolate Coins to buy powerups! *Eat Mince Pies to increase your score! *Fly with Rudolph and the other reindeer! *Global Leaderboards *10 Awesome Achievements

*** This is the full version of Stories Gone Mad that gives you access to every story. There is also a free version of this app. Stories you create in the free version do not carry over to this full version. Poindexter, a pint-sized scientist, has grown bored with his library of stories. He wants to make his stories more interesting and that's where you come in! You will need to feed Poindexter's super computer a series of words so that she can insert them in a story to generate something new and exciting. That's right, his computer is a "she". Stories: Read existing stories or ad lib and write new stories of your own. This app contains original stories, fairy tales, nursery rhymes, and even the popular MASH game. Many stories adapted from classical works have new twists and have been rewritten as madlibs. Here are some of the stories available in the app: - The Three Little Pigs - Little Red Riding Hood - Cinderella - The Ugly Duckling - M.A.S.H. - Mega M.A.S.H. - Hansel & Gretel - The Tortoise and the Hare - Jack and the Beanstalk - Goldilocks and the Three Bears - Rumplestiltskin - Hey Diddle Diddle - The Revolting Blob - The Frog Prince - The Lion and the Mouse - There was a Crooked Man - Little Miss Muffet Target Audience & Education: This game can be enjoyed by anyone. It has been made suitable for younger children but, older crowds will still appreciate the humour thrown in and should not hesitate to try this out. This app may be suitable for kids as an educational tool to help them learn about English words, nouns, verbs, adjectives, adverbs, grammar, and sentence structure. Stories are reviewed and edited by English and Education professionals in Canada. Content & Updates: Stories written by the app Developer are mainly shortened versions of classic fairy tales that have been adapted to work with this app so, they are a different take on these stories and sometimes even have new twists. This app works offline, too! You will want to be connected to a network the first time you load this up to get initial content so, go ahead and open it as soon as it finishes installing. The libs (library of stories) will continue to update in the future whenever you open this app with a network connection. Disclaimer: When a story is created in the app or is shared and leaves the domain of the app, it is no longer property of the app Developer and becomes the property or creation of the user. The author of Stories Gone Mad is not responsible for words used (or combinations of words) that can be made offensive to someone.
release_text: May 24, 2015: Updates for recent Android OS. New story added for full version. Nov 15, 2014: Now with 3 ways to play: Word cards, custom words, or instant story. July 19, 2014: Brand new way to mix up stories by choosing one of 3 randomized cards! July 6, 2014: Generate a story instantly with Random Words and choose from a Random Word Pack. More stories and a random word pack added. Nov 23, 2013: View the original version of any story. More stories added (including M.A.S.H.).

JOIN DR. QUIZ on his quest to solve riddles through the Jungle, Ocean and Desert. ★FEATURING HUNDREDS of unique riddles to tax yours and others minds. As you progress on your adventure you will collect coins for each correct Riddle that's solved. Bonus coins will be awarded for solving the Riddle with no wrong guesses. ★YOU CAN use your coins to get up to 3 hints per Riddle. Or additionally you can use your coins to Solve the Riddle for you! ★DO YOU think you are tough enough to complete the quest? There's only one way to find out. (Mosquito and bug spray optional on this adventure!) THIS GAME is FREE to download and does not require any In-App purchases to complete. In-App purchases can be made to purchase additional virtual coins to aid completion of the quest. Any problems with In-App purchases should be directed to the 'Email Developer' link at the bottom of this listing.

Funny puzzle game to challenge your mental skill. You have to remove the beams from the tower, without breaking the vase. Go ahead through the different levels and discover new challenges. * In this free version you can play the first 20 levels.

Golf Golf Golf is Played in a Cartoon Woodland. 18 Challenging Golf Holes Course. There are moving obstacles, bouncing mushrooms, speed ramps and many more clever levels that you need to complete under par. But don't worry if you don't make par, you can always play the golf game again and do better next time, after all you can only get better if you play golf games more!
